33a2('bum): mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par
33a3('bum): mi rtog go / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /sna'i
33a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
33a5('bum): gyis tshor pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan
33a6('bum): mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par
33a7('bum): mi rtog go / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi
33b1('bum): rtog go/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /yid kyi 'dus te reg
33b2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /sa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /sa'i khams kyi rang
33b3('bum): bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / chu'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /chu'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi
33b4('bum): rtog go / me'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /me'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /me'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rlung gi khams su mi rtog
33b5('bum): rnam par mi rtog go / rlung gi khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /nam mkha'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/
33b6('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/
33b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /ma rig par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/
34a1('bum): ma rig pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /ma rig pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'du byed du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'du byed
34a2('bum): kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi
34a3('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /ming dang gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog
34a4('bum): rnam par mi rtog go / ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /skye mched drug tu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /skye mched drug gi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
34a5('bum): go |skye mched drug gi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi
34a6('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go / tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /sred par mi
34a7('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sred pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /sred pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /len par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /len pa'i
34b1('bum): mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / len pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /srid par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /srid pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /srid
34b2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / skye bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /skye ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /skye ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rga
34b3('bum): shir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rga shi'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rga shi'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'dod pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'dod
34b4('bum): pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /gzugs kyi khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /gzugs kyi khams
34b5('bum): kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /gzugs med pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /gzugs med pa'i
34b6('bum): khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /sbyin
34b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par
35a1('bum): mi rtog go / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi
35a2('bum): rtog go / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
35a3('bum): du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /brtson
35a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan
35a5('bum): mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/
35a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /nang stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par
35a7('bum): mi rtog go / nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /phyi stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/
35b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /phyi nang stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan
35b2('bum): mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam bar mi rtog go /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar
35b3('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /chen po stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog
35b4('bum): rnam par mi rtog go / chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /don dam pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par
35b5('bum): mi rtog go / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'dus byas stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par
35b6('bum): mi rtog go / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog
35b7('bum): rnam par mi rtog go / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
36a1('bum): nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
36a2('bum): nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par
36a3('bum): mi rtog go / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du
36a4('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
36a5('bum): rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /chos
36a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi
36a7('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mi dmigs pa stong pa
36b1('bum): nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /dngos po med
36b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /ngo
36b3('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam
36b4('bum): par mi rtog go / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /dran
36b5('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / dran pa nye bar bzhag ba rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog
36b6('bum): rnam par mi rtog go / yang dag par spong ba rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi
36b7('bum): rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rdzu 'phrul gyi
37a1('bum): rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / dbang po rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /dbang po rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi
37a2('bum): rtog go / dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /stobs rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /stobs rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /stobs
37a3('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
37a4('bum): go |byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'phags pa'i lam yan
37a5('bum): lag brgyad pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su
37a6('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/
37a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi
37b1('bum): rtog go / tshad med pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
37b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /gzugs
37b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par thar pa brgyad du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mtshan mar mi rtog
37b4('bum): rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mthar gyis
37b5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rnam par
37b6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
37b7('bum): mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mngon par shes pa
38a1('bum): rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
38a2('bum): du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / ting nge 'dzin rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin
38a3('bum): du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang
38a4('bum): bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/
38a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mi 'jigs pa bzhir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
38a6('bum): go / mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /so so yang dag par rig pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog
38a7('bum): rnam par mi rtog go / so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /byams pa chen por mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /byams pa chen po'i mtshan mar mi
38b1('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go / byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /snying rje chen por mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /snying rje chen po'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
38b2('bum): go |snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
38b3('bum): mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /thams cad shes pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
38b4('bum): go |thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du mi rtog
38b5('bum): rnam par mi rtog go / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rnam pa
38b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang
38b7('bum): bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'du shes bsam gyis
39a1('bum): mi khyab bo/ /'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mig bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rna ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sna
39a2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /lce bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /lus bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /yid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sgra bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /dri
39a3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /ro bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /reg bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /chos bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rna ba'i rnam
39a4('bum): par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi
39a5('bum): khyab bo/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sna'i 'dus te
39a6('bum): reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab
39a7('bum): bo| |mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
39b1('bum): gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /yid kyi 'dus
39b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /me'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rlung gi khams
39b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'du byed bsam gyis mi
39b4('bum): khyab bo/ /rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /tshor ba bsam
39b5('bum): gyis mi khyab bo/ /sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /len pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rga shi bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /
39b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /brtson 'grus
39b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /nang stong pa nyid
40a1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
40a2('bum): bo| |chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
40a3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam
40a4('bum): gyis mi khyab bo/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mi
40a5('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
40a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
40a7('bum): rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'phags
40b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis
40b2('bum): mi khyab bo/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
40b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /ting nge
40b4('bum): 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab
40b5('bum): bo| |so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /thams cad shes
40b6('bum): pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub
40b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sbyang pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
41a1('bum): yongs su gzung ba yin no/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam bo nyis brgya drug pa/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
41a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /
41a3('bum): rab 'byor/ tshor ba zab ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ 'du shes zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed zab pa'i
41a4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ mig zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
41a5('bum): tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ sna zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ lce zab
41a6('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ lus zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ yid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
41a7('bum): phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ sgra zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/
41b1('bum): dri zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ ro zab ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ reg zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
41b2('bum): zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ chos zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/
41b3('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i
41b4('bum): rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi
41b5('bum): rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i
41b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i 'dus
41b7('bum): te reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi 'dus
42a1('bum): te reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
42a2('bum): tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
42a3('bum): ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i 'du te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ lus
42a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
42a5('bum): tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ sa'i khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ chu'i khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab
42a6('bum): 'byor/ me'i khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha'i
42a7('bum): khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rnam bar shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ ma rig
42b1('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab
42b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ ming dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ skye mched drug zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
42b3('bum): pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ reg pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ sred pa
42b4('bum): zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ len pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ srid pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
42b5('bum): tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ skye ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rga shi zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab
42b6('bum): 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
42b7('bum): zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
43a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi
43a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid zab
43a3('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i
43a4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ don dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir
43a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir
43a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ thog ma dang tha ma med
43a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rang
43b1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rang gi
43b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ dngos
43b3('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po
43b4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/
43b5('bum): yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ dbang po
43b6('bum): zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ stobs zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir shes
43b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa zab
44a1('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ tshad
44a2('bum): med pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab
44a3('bum): 'byor/ rnam par thar ba brgyad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
44a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/
44a5('bum): mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo
44a6('bum): zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ mi 'jigs pa
44a7('bum): zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ byams pa chen
44b1('bum): po zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
44b2('bum): brgyad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ thams cad shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa
44b3('bum): shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /gsol pa/
44b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che'i phung po ste/ chos rin po che'i phung bo rnams sgrub pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sgrub pa'o/ /bsam
44b5('bum): gtan bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag ba bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /
44b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /dbang po lnga sgrub pa'o/ /stobs lnga sgrub pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgrub pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam
44b7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa sgrub pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad sgrub pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgrub pa'o/ /rnam par
45a1('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgrub pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub
45a2('bum): pa'o| |gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgrub pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /byams
45a3('bum): pa chen po sgrub pa'o/ /snying rje chen po sgrub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
45a4('bum): 'bras bu sgrub pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa'o/ /rang byang chub sgrub pa'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa
45a5('bum): shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
45a6('bum): gzugs dag pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / 'du shes dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / mig dag pa dang / rna ba dag pa dang / sna dag pa dang /
45a7('bum): lce dag pa dang / lus dag pa dang / yid dag pa dang / gzugs dag pa dang / sgra dag pa dang / dri dag pa dang / ro dag pa dang / reg dag pa dang / chos dag pa dang / mig
45b1('bum): gi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa dag pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes ba dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / yid kyi
45b2('bum): rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus
45b3('bum): te reg pa dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bdag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te
45b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
45b5('bum): gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / sa'i khams dag pa dang / chu'i khams dag pa dang / me'i khams dag pa dang / rlung gi khams dag pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dag pa dang / rnam par shes
45b6('bum): pa'i khams dag pa dang / ma rig pa dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / ming dang gzugs dag pa dang / skye mched drug dag pa dang / reg pa dag pa
45b7('bum): dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / sred pa dag pa dang / len pa dag pa dang / srid pa dag pa dang / skye ba dag pa dang / rga shi dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / tshul
46a1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
46a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / stong pa nyid stong
46a3('bum): pa nyid dag pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dag pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mtha' las
46a4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chos thams cad
46a5('bum): stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag
46a6('bum): pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dag pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag pa dang / dbang po
46a7('bum): dag pa dang / stobs dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan
46b1('bum): dag pa dang / tshad med pa dag pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa dag pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam
46b2('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dag pa dang / de bzhin
46b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dag pa dang / byams pa chen po dag pa dang / snying rje chen po dag pa dang / sangs
46b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dag pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag pa'i slad du/
46b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mod lta bu bstan pa'i tshe/ bar chad mang du mi 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /
46b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bar chad mang po 'byung ste/ de bas
46b7('bum): na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba la bar
47a1('bum): chad du mi 'gyur bar 'dri na'ang myur du 'dri bar bya'o/ /klog na'ang myur du klog go/ /ston na'ang myur du ston no/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya na'ang myur du
47a2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /bsgom na'ang myur du bsgom mo/ /rab 'byor/ de bas na gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zla ba
47a3('bum): gcig gis 'dri bar bya na'ang des de bzhin du 'dri bar bya'o/ /gal te zla ba gnyis sam/ gal te zla ba gsum mam/ gal te zla ba bzhi'am/ gal te zla ba lnga'am/ gal te zla ba
47a4('bum): drug gam/ gal te lo'i bar gyis 'dri bar bya na'ang de bzhin du 'dri bar bya'o/ /gal te zla ba gcig gis ston pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du
47a5('bum): yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya na'ang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /gal te lo'i bar gyis bsgom par bya na'ang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
47a6('bum): de ni nor bu rin po che chen po la bar chad mang du 'byung ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ci nas kyang mi 'dri ba dang / mi klog pa dang /
47a7('bum): mi ston pa dang / kha ton mi bgyi ba dang / yid la mi bgyi ba dang / mi bsgom pa'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag bar chad mi bgyid pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
47b1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ci nas kyang mi 'dri ba dang / mi klog pa dang / mi ston pa dang / kha ton mi bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya ba dang /
47b2('bum): mi bsgom pa'i slad du bdud sdig to can bar chad mi byed pa'ang ma yin mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa
47b3('bum): dang | kha ton du byed pa dang / bsgom pa rnams la bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
47b4('bum): ci'i mthus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du bgyi ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ba dang /
47b5('bum): bsgom pa la bdud sdig to can bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
47b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya
47b7('bum): bar mi nus so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de
48a1('bum): dag gi mthus kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha
48a2('bum): ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang byang chub
48a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la dgongs shing yongs su 'dzin pa mdzad do/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
48a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa de
48a5('bum): dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
48a6('bum): rnams kyi dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la/ bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i/ bu de ni gang de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
48a7('bum): tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa
48b1('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba la dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / klog cing ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin
48b2('bum): du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa la dgongs pa mdzad pa ni chos nyid kyis de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri
48b3('bum): zhing klog pa dang / ston cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa des kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o/ /klog go /ston to/ /
48b4('bum): kha ton du byed do/ /tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/ /bsgom mo zhes bya bar khong du chud bar bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung ste/
48b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / bsgom mo 'tshal kun kyang sangs rgyas
48b6('bum): kyi mthu lags sam/ kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa
48b7('bum): bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
49a1('bum): la byed cing bsgom pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin bar rig par bya'o/ /de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs yin par rig par bya'o/ /
49a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du
49a3('bum): yid la bgyid cing bsgom pa de dag ni shar phyogs nas phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad dang grangs ma
49a4('bum): mchis pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong pa dang / chos ston pa de dag gis mkhyen te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du bgyid pa
49a5('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing bsgom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /thugs su chud do/ /bcom ldan 'das
49a6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /
49a7('bum): ston cing kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing bsgom pa de dag ni/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi
49b1('bum): phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
49b2('bum): 'das tshad med grangs med pa de dag gis mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thugs su chud do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
49b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa
49b4('bum): dang | de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag gis kyang 'di ltar bdag cig ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to zhes bye bar rig par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
49b5('bum): bu| gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba de dag kyang shes
49b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mo pa mang bar 'gyur te/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
49b7('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byad/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed do/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
50a1('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing 'chang ba de dag kyang don che ba dang / legs pa che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / rnam par
50a2('bum): smin pa che bar 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su non gyi dar du dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song du skye bar mi
50a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
50a4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba nyid kyas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
50a5('bum): phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur
50a6('bum): ro| |bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang
50a7('bum): bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang
50b1('bum): bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang
50b2('bum): bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa
50b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos
50b4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi
50b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam
50b6('bum): yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
50b7('bum): pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams dang rnam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
51a1('bum): dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang nam
51a2('bum): yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
51a3('bum): pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang nam yang bral bar
51a4('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar
51a5('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang nam
51a6('bum): yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par reg pa bzhi dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen po dang
51a7('bum): nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /thams cad
51b1('bum): shes pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur
51b2('bum): ro| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang /
51b3('bum): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par
51b4('bum): 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
51b5('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song du log par ltung bar mi
51b6('bum): 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon
51b7('bum): par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
52a1('bum): theg pa'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /shA
52a2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas yul bar ta ni na spyod par gyur te/ de na'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang /
52a3('bum): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog
52a4('bum): par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
52a5('bum): dang | rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par
52a6('bum): ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug
52a7('bum): po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi
52b1('bum): theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /shA
52b2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yul bar ta ni nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang /
52b3('bum): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par
52b4('bum): 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
52b5('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi
52b6('bum): 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis
52b7('bum): mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs
53a1('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /
53a2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud dang / byang phyogs kyi rgyud na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga brgya tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par
53a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ da ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
53a4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos dang 'dul ba dar la bab pa'i che/ dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur te/ chos de'ang gang zhe
53a5('bum): na| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
53a6('bum): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag la ni ngas dgongs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
53a7('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing / bris nas kyang me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
53b1('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed pa de dag kyang ngas dgongs te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs
53b2('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis
53b3('bum): mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti
53b4('bum): dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa gsum pos
53b5('bum): rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /
53b6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas brjod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstod
53b7('bum): do| |bsngags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs
54a1('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
54a2('bum): gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /
54a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston
54a4('bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
54a5('bum): ni| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ nub
54a6('bum): phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
54a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
54b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
54b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs
54b3('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod
54b4('bum): do| |bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs
54b5('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs
54b6('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang
54b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston
55a1('bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang
55a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs
55a3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de
55a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin
55a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ nub byang gi phyogs
55a6('bum): mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
55a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
55b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
55b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi
55b3('bum): spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /
55b4('bum): bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
55b5('bum): dang | chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs
55b6('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
55b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin
56a1('bum): no| |de de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ de la/ shA ra dwa
56a2('bum): ti'i bu/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ro/ /mos
56a3('bum): par byas nas kyang 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed par 'gyur
56a4('bum): ro| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par byed pa dang / mos par byas nas
56a5('bum): 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni yun ring bo nas theg pa la
56a6('bum): yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par rig par bya'o/ /gsol
56a7('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus slad ma'i chen byang gi phyogs cha dar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
56b1('bum): zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyis nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
56b2('bum): pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa de lta bu ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na byang gi phyogs
56b3('bum): cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni mang du 'byung ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes
56b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe mi 'jum / yongs su mi 'jum/ mi 'jigs mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
56b5('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i rjes su 'brangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
56b6('bum): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la yongs su zhus/ yongs su dris pa'i phyir te/ de'ang ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs
56b7('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
57a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
57a2('bum): mo de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
57a3('bum): ro| |rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
57a4('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su
57a5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chen po stong pa
57a6('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
57a7('bum): dag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs
57b1('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs
57b2('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rang bzhin
57b3('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
57b4('bum): mo de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
57b5('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
57b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dran
57b7('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang dag par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
58a1('bum): de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
58a2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
58a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden
58a4('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshad med
58a5('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
58a6('bum): bu mo de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su
58a7('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
58b1('bum): ro| |rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
58b2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs
58b3('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
58b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni snying rje chen
58b5('bum): po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs
58b6('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ de
58b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni ngas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do/ /'das pa'i
59a1('bum): d us na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
59a2('bum): gis kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do/ /de dag tshe 'das nas kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag
59a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de dag gzhan la'ang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du rnam pa de lta bu nyid
59a4('bum): brjod par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam bar bzhag par 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang /
59a5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi nus na/ sdig to la mos pa dang / sdig to'i spyod pa can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spong
59a6('bum): ba gzhan gyis lta ci smos/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos
59a7('bum): nas/ dga' zhing nyams bde brgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'ang dge ba'i chos la 'god par
59b1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das pa dag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po
59b2('bum): dang | srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu rab tu dgod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o/ /yang
59b3('bum): dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o/ /phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs
59b4('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la sems kyis rnam par blta ste/ ngas rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
59b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya
59b6('bum): phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar
59b7('bum): bgyi'o/ /yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o/ /phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das
60a1('bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la
60a2('bum): thugs kyis rnam par gzigs te/ rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya
60a3('bum): phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu 'god par 'gyur/ yang dag par ston
60a4('bum): par 'gyur/ yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur/ yang dag par dga' bar bed par 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /
60a5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la mos pa rlobs po cher 'gyur te/ de dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong bar
60a6('bum): 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa rlabs po che gtang zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byas nas/ rnam par
60a7('bum): smin pa rlabs po che yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su bzung nas/ sems can de dag nyid kyi don du rnam par smin pa rlabs po che las de bas
60b1('bum): kyang ches rlabs che ba'i rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar phyi'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang / sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ de dag dge
60b2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / 'di lta ste/ shes rab
60b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mngon du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag la brten par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi de zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
60b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'ang sog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog
60b5('bum): chags stong phrag mang bo dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par sten par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par bskul bar
60b6('bum): 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
60b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las/ chos gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis te/ de
61a1('bum): bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/ /sems can rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma
61a2('bum): mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che ste/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen te/ /'das
61a3('bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams
61a4('bum): kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
61a5('bum): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
61a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub
61a7('bum): sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su ma byon to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
61b1('bum): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'tshol ba dang / yongs su 'tshol ba'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
61b2('bum): mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'tshol ba dang / yongs su 'tshol ba las kyang la las ni btsal ba las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thob par 'gyur/ la las ni thob par mi
61b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni de lta ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus mi gtong ba de dag kun gyis kyang pha rol tu
61b4('bum): phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag
61b5('bum): gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
61b6('bum): ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol
61b7('bum): tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag mi 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
62a1('bum): chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing / yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang /
62a2('bum): 'god cing rab tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
62a3('bum): de dag ni nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can yongs su smin par ma byas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
62a4('bum): sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du ji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag las brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
62a5('bum): las| le'u sum cu pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya bdun pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom
62a6('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa/ pha rol tu phyin
62a7('bum): pa drug la spyod pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags na/
62b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de dag la bar chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
62b2('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye na/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
62b3('bum): 'das/ ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur/ de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
62b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su
