62b5('bum): rdzogs par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bzod pa'i pha
62b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs
62b7('bum): par byed na/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des shin tu 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
63a1('bum): gzhan yang shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
63a2('bum): 'das/ ci'i slad du shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan
63a3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
63a4('bum): spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
63a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la des rlom sems su byed na/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na spobs pa he cang myur bar
63a6('bum): skye ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang glal cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri 'dri na/ rab
63a7('bum): 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang dgod cing 'dri na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems
63b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ phan tshun steg cing 'dri na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
63b2('bum): su rig par bya'o/ /sems g.yeng zhing 'dri na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /yi ge gzhan la chags shing tshig gi
63b3('bum): don mi shes par 'dri na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /'di'i rom myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab
63b4('bum): 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang glag ming lung 'bog na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems
63b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /glal cing kha ton byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ ston pa dang / glal cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor/
63b6('bum): de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang phan tshun dgong cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub
63b7('bum): par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ /rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang phan tshun
64a1('bum): steg cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub bar byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
64a2('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang sems g.yeng bas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la
64a3('bum): byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan la chags shing 'dzin
64a4('bum): tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
64a5('bum): bya'o| |de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du 'di'i ro ma myong
64a6('bum): nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das/
64a7('bum): ci'i slad du 'di'i ro mi myong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi
64b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin
64b2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan to zhes ma dad pa'i
64b3('bum): yid kyis stan las langs shing 'dong ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad
64b4('bum): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan pa de dag stan las langs shing mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
64b5('bum): dpa' chen po skyon med par ma chud pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan to/ /de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi 'byung ngo / /
64b6('bum): bdag gi ming yang yongs su ma brjod do zhes bdud ma gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
64b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa lags/ bcom ldan
65a1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi ming ni yongs su mi brjod de/ de la bdag
65a2('bum): gi ming yang 'di las mi 'byung / bdag gang du skyes pa'i gong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gyi ming 'di'ang mi 'byung ngo zhes/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyan to snyam
65a3('bum): byed cing / 'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na/ sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing gom pa ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur
65a4('bum): te/ de dag la bzod pa la brtson par bya dgos so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa de dag
65a5('bum): kun chub par bya bar sems te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te de
65a6('bum): nyid kyi yan lag dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
65a7('bum): par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang
65b1('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
65b2('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par
65b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /
65b4('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
65b5('bum): pa'i byang chub 'thob bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing kun chub par
65b6('bum): bya bar sems pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
65b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang
66a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
66a2('bum): dper na/ khyi la la zhig rje bo'i zan na ram bor te las mi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i
66a3('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang /
66a4('bum): 'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la brten par sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
66a5('bum): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
66a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas khe dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor/
66a7('bum): de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig glang po 'dod la des glang po rnyed nas
66b1('bum): glang po'i rjes bcal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags
66b2('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde gang
66b3('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems pa dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
66b4('bum): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la/ ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing des ba lag gi rjes
66b5('bum): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po'i chad 'di ngang mnyam mam mi mnyam snyam na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu da mkhas pa'i dang tshul can yin nam/ gsol
66b6('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
66b7('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/
67a1('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste/
67a2('bum): rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phya mkhan nam phya mkhan gyi slob ma rnam par
67a3('bum): rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa zhig dbub cing bslang bar 'dod de nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang
67a4('bum): las chad blang bar sems na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe tshul bzung ste/ de
67a5('bum): dang 'dra bar bang ba dbub bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ phywa
67a6('bum): mkhan nam/ phywa mkhan gyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig par bgyi ste/ mkhas
67a7('bum): pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
67b1('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang
67b2('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i
67b3('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni ma lags
67b4('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes
67b5('bum): bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/ des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas/ 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de kha dog dang / dbyibs ci
67b6('bum): 'dra ba zhig yod ces/ des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma bzung par bsams te/ 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs
67b7('bum): dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma'ang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig yod grang zhes zer na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol
68a1('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de
68a2('bum): bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes
68a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde drag pa las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar
68a4('bum): sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol
68a5('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su
68a6('bum): rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la zhig gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal bar sems
68a7('bum): shing | des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas drug cu pa'i kha zas la bzang bar bsams na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin
68b1('bum): nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg
68b2('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang /
68b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
68b4('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
68b5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis
68b6('bum): nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa rnyed nas/ nor bu mching bu dang bskrun par bsams na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/
68b7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
69a1('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
69a2('bum): mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor/ de
69a3('bum): la ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni
69a4('bum): ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
69a5('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i
69a6('bum): dkrugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi spobs pa dang / sgra'i spobs pa dang / dri'i spobs pa dang / ro'i spobs pa dang / reg gi spobs pa dang /
69a7('bum): chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang /
69b1('bum): shes rab kyi spobs pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i
69b2('bum): spobs pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang / dbang po'i spobs
69b3('bum): pa dang / stobs kyi spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i spobs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
69b4('bum): gyi spobs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
69b5('bum): nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs
69b6('bum): pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa
69b7('bum): nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa
70a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs
70a2('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
70a3('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i spobs pa dang /
70a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
70a5('bum): bu'i spobs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i spobs pa dang rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa skya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i
70a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa med pas rnam par byang ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /
70a7('bum): rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab
70b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol
70b2('bum): tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /rab
70b3('bum): 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
70b4('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
70b5('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
70b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de lta ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes
70b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
71a1('bum): tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
71a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
71a3('bum): yin te mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo
71a4('bum): bo nyid yong pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /
71a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
71a6('bum): ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
71a7('bum): yin te mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rang gi
71b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
71b2('bum): yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs
71b3('bum): so| |dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
71b4('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /byang chub
71b5('bum): kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
71b6('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs
71b7('bum): so| |gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /mthar
72a1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
72a2('bum): smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
72a3('bum): yin te mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs
72a4('bum): so| |mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po'i ngo
72a5('bum): bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin
72a6('bum): te mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /
72a7('bum): ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ dngos po med pas dngos po med pa bri bar mi
72b1('bum): nus so/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po med ces bya bar 'du shes na/
72b2('bum): de'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
72b3('bum): pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par
72b4('bum): chags pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /brtson 'grus gyi pha rol tu phyin
72b5('bum): pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge
72b6('bum): ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis
72b7('bum): pa'o| |rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mig ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rna ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sna ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
73a1('bum): lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sgra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dri ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
73a2('bum): ro ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /reg ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chos ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma
73a3('bum): mchis pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma/ mchis pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam
73a4('bum): par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//
73a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
73a6('bum): tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg
73a7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//
73b1('bum): sa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /me'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni yi
73b2('bum): ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam par ma shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis
73b3('bum): pa'o| |ming dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis
73b4('bum): pa'o| |len pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /srid pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rga shi ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /phyi
73b5('bum): stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//
73b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong
73b7('bum): pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yi
74a1('bum): ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa
74a2('bum): nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma
74a3('bum): mchis pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams mi yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
74a4('bum): dbang po rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni
74a5('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshad med pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /gzugs
74a6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma
74a7('bum): mchis pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /ting
74b1('bum): nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams
74b2('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yi ga ma mchis pa'o/ /byams pa chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sangs
74b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam pa thams
74b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha
74b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la/ yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid cing / yi ge ma mchis pa'i brtson
74b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
74b7('bum): pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
75a1('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
75a2('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
75a3('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
75a4('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
75a5('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
75a6('bum): la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin stong
75a7('bum): pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi
75b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
75b2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos
75b3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
75b4('bum): pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma
75b5('bum): mchis pa'i dbang po rnams la mngon par chags bar bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
75b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
75b7('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
76a1('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
76a2('bum): la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i
76a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la
76a4('bum): mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la
76a5('bum): mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
76a6('bum): stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so
76a7('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i byams pa chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
76b1('bum): pa'i snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
76b2('bum): pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
76b3('bum): pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid na/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
76b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha
76b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i
76b6('bum): tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
76b7('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa
77a1('bum): dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang bsgom pa'i tshe/ grong gi yid la bya ba dang / grong rdal gyi yid la bya ba dang / khams
77a2('bum): kyi yid la bya ba dang / rgyal po'i grong 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang / khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang / bla ma dang / mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang / ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
77a3('bum): pha dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phu nu dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / sring mo dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / rkun po dang
77a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phyag dar ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / smad 'tshong ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bud
77a5('bum): med dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skye na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung
77a6('bum): dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te/ de dag kyang byang
77a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
77b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ khe dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / chos gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po
77b2('bum): byung la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
77b3('bum): yid la byed pa'i tshe/ de dag gi ro myong par byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
77b4('bum): 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
77b5('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom
77b6('bum): pa'i tshe bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo zab mo gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
77b7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar
78a1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de/ /de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs
78a2('bum): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas bdud yis bsnyen pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab mo de dag la 'dod pa mi skyed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni rnam pa
78a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mi mkhas pa dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
78a4('bum): thos nas spang bar sems te/ de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa'ang rgya cher bstan te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
78a5('bum): las kyang thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
78a6('bum): zab mo 'di bor zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
78a7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha
78b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya brgyad pa/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya
78b2('bum): bar dga' la/ chos smra ba ni phyi shol byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
78b3('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya bar phyir shol mi byed la/ chos nyan pa ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud
78b4('bum): kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni yul gzhan du 'gro
78b5('bum): na| rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni khe dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad
78b6('bum): pa lhur len cing / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad lhur len la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams
78b7('bum): pa| dran pa nye bar bzhag pa mi g.yeng ba sems rtsa gcig tu 'dus pa shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/ khe dang bkur stis 'jigs na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
79a1('bum): pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
79a2('bum): chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la/ rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dran pa nye bar
79a3('bum): bzhag pa mi g.yeng ba/ sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/ khe dang bkur stis 'jigs la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa che zhing sdig to 'dod la/ khe dang
79a4('bum): bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len cing / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad lhur len na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
79a5('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su
79a6('bum): rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ zas phyis mi len pa/ stan gcig pa/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms
79a7('bum): len pa/ dur khrod pa/ bla gab pa med pa/ shing drug pa/ cog pu ba/ gzhi ji bzhin pa/ chos gos gsum par gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni dkon pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin/
79b1('bum): phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/ stan gcig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab med pa ma yin/ shing drung
79b2('bum): pa ma yin/ cog bu pa ma yin/ gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/ chos gos gsum pa ma yin na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog
79b3('bum): pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos
79b4('bum): nyan pa ni dgon pa ba/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ zas phyis mi len pa/ stan gcig pa/ zas ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa/ dur khrod pa/ bla gab med pa/ shing drug
79b5('bum): pa/ cog bu pa/ gzhi ji bzhin pa/ chos gos gsum par gyur la/ chos smra ba ni dgon pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin/ phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/
79b6('bum): stan gcig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab med pa ma yin/ shing drung pa ma yin/ cog bu pa ma yin/ gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/ chos
79b7('bum): gos gsum pa ma yin na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang
80a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/
80a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar 'dod/ lung dbog par 'dod/ kha ton byed par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni ma dad pa/ tshul khrims ngan pa can/ sdig pa'i chos can
80a3('bum): zhig ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar mi 'dod/ lung dbog par mi 'dod/ kha ton byed par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
80a4('bum): mo 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lus su rig par bya'o/ /
80a5('bum): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar 'dod/ lung dbog par 'dod/ kha ton byed par 'dod la/ chos
80a6('bum): nyan pa ni ma dad na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang
80a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sems la chags
80b1('bum): pa med la/ chos nyan pa ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog
80b2('bum): pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan
80b3('bum): pa ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sems la chags pa med la/ chos smra ba ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang
80b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
80b5('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni chos smra ba la gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad yongs su gtong bar 'dod
80b6('bum): la| chos smra ba ni len par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/
80b7('bum): de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni glengs pa tsam gyis shes la/ chos nyan pa ni bkri
81a1('bum): dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu
81a2('bum): rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni glengs pa tsam gyis
81a3('bum): shes la/ chos smra ba ni bkri dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen
81a4('bum): mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa
81a5('bum): dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba
81a6('bum): dang | rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/ chos nyan pa ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa
81a7('bum): dang | ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa
81b1('bum): bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/
81b2('bum): de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang /
81b3('bum): tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang /
81b4('bum): gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/ chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi
81b5('bum): dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes
81b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi
81b7('bum): las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan la/ chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi ldan na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab
82a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
82a2('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan la/ chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi ldan na/ rab
82a3('bum): 'byor| de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
82a4('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mkhas la/ chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mi
82a5('bum): mkhas na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems
82a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mkhas la/ chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug
82a7('bum): la thabs mi mkhas na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub
82b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gzungs thob par gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni gzungs ma thob na/ rab 'byor/
82b2('bum): de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
82b3('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gzungs thob par gyur la/ chos smra ba ni gzungs ma thob na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
82b4('bum): mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
82b5('bum): gzhan yang chos smra ba ni bri bar 'dod/ klag par 'dod/ lung dbog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ bsgom par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni bri bar mi 'dod/ bklag par mi 'dod/
82b6('bum): lung dbog par mi 'dod/ kha ton bya bar mi 'dod/ mnyan par mi 'dod/ bsgom par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dri ba dang / lung 'bog
82b7('bum): pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bri bar
83a1('bum): 'dod/ bklag par 'dod/ lung dbog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ mnyan par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni bri bar mi 'dod/ klag par mi 'dod/ lung
83a2('bum): dbog par mi 'dod/ kha ton bya bar mi 'dod/ bsgom par mi 'dod par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
83a3('bum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i
83a4('bum): sred pa dang bral/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bral/ the tshom dang bral ba/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang / snyom
83a5('bum): pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bcas/ the tshom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed
83a6('bum): pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred
83a7('bum): pa dang bral/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bral/ the tshom dang bral la/ chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid
83b1('bum): dang | 'gyod pa dang bcas/ the tshom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa
83b2('bum): ste| rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog
83b3('bum): pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ la la zhig der 'ongs te/ sems can dmyal ba'i mi snyan pa brjod/ byol song gi skye
83b4('bum): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul gyi mi snyan pa brjod cing / sems can dmyal ba ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ /byol song gi skye gnas ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal
83b5('bum): lo| |gshin rje'i 'jig rten ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ /yi dwags kyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ /khyod kyis sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar phyin par gyis shig /gang la sdug
83b6('bum): bsngal stong phrag mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ khyod yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur te re zhes zer
83b7('bum): na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
84a1('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog
84a2('bum): pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ la la zhig der 'ongs te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing / sum cu rtsa gsum
84a3('bum): gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ gzhan 'phrul
84a4('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi
84a5('bum): legs pa brjod/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi
84a6('bum): legs pa brjod/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams
84a7('bum): kyi legs pa brjod/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs
84b1('bum): pa brjod/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi legs
84b2('bum): pa brjod/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ rnam shes
84b3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa
84b4('bum): brjod cing / 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o/ /gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde'o/ /gzugs med
84b5('bum): pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa zha ba rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste/ de dag kyang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag med pa'o/ /rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can/ zad pa'i chos can/
84b6('bum): 'jigs pa'i chos can/ skye ba'i chos can/ 'gag pa'i chos can yin gyi/ khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
84b7('bum): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig /'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig /phyin chad 'khor ba nam 'khar bar gyis shig ces zer na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang
85a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
85a2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na
85a3('bum): gnas na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ma ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems
85a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/ zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni 'khor gyi nang
85a5('bum): na gnas na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems
85a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos nyan pa ni tshogs
85a7('bum): yongs su sdud na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems
85b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/ zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni tshogs yongs
85b2('bum): su sdud na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
85b3('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ /gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'di skad du/ su nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'drir sbyin no zhes zer la/ chos
85b4('bum): nyan pa ni phyi bzhin mi 'brang na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang
85b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni drung du
85b6('bum): 'gro ba'i skabs mi 'byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang
85b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
86a1('bum): 'drir gzhug par 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par 'dod/ lung dbog par 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni zang zing cung zad
86a2('bum): kyi phyir drung du 'gro bar ma mos na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/
86a3('bum): de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
86a4('bum): bri bar 'dod/ klog par 'dod/ lung dbog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ bsgom par 'dod/ nyan par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86a5('bum): phyin pa sbyin par mi 'dod/ 'drir gzhug par mi 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par mi 'dod/ lung 'bog par mi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par mi 'dod/ sgom du gzhug par mi 'dod/
86a6('bum): nyan du gzhug par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang
86a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod
86b1('bum): la| chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab
86b2('bum): 'byor| de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs
86b3('bum): der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos smra pa ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi
86b4('bum): ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas dkon pa dang / gang na chu
86b5('bum): dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
86b6('bum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang na zas
86b7('bum): dkon pa dang / chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog
87a1('bum): pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab
87a2('bum): 'byor| gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas med pa dang / chu med pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa'ang rjes su 'brang na/ des de la 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod
87a3('bum): zang zing gi don du song ste ci rung / legs par bsam pa sems par gyis shig /zas thob pa ma thob dang / bsod mi bsod kyis 'gyod par gyur te re zhes zer na/ de'i phyir chos ston
87a4('bum): pa des kyang / thabs phra mos chos la spang ba byas par 'gyur te/ de'ang mi dga' zhing 'di snyam du 'du shes te/ 'di ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ma yin gyi/ spong ba'i mtshan
87a5('bum): ma yin no snyam na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang
87a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa
87a7('bum): dang | rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / sprul gyi 'jigs pa dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa dag kyang chos
87b1('bum): kyi don du chos kyis skom zhing rjes su 'brang na/ dge slong chos smra bas chos nyan pa de dag la 'di skad smras te/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyod gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs
87b2('bum): pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / sprul gyi 'jigs pa dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der dong ste ci rung / zhes de ltar dge slong chos smra
87b3('bum): ba des chos mi bstan pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug pa'i mi 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par mi 'dod/ lung 'bog par mi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par
87b4('bum): mi 'dod/ nyan du gzhug par mi 'dod par gyur la/ de dag gis dge slong chos smra ba'i tshig de dag thos nas/ mi dga' zhing mi dga' ba'i tshul can du gyur te/ dge slong chos smra ba gang
87b5('bum): na ba der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang
87b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor byed par gyur te/ de
87b7('bum): bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor gyur bas bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer de dag yang dang yang blta bar sems shing / der yang dang yang blta bar sems nyan pa phyir bzlog
88a1('bum): cing / tshe dang ldan pa dag /ngas ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong blta dgos te/ bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes zer nas/ des chos
88a2('bum): nyan pa de dag phyir bzlog pa'i phyir 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/
88a3('bum): rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang 'dud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /
88a4('bum): ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su'ang 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bog par mi 'gyur ba dang / kha ton byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
88a5('bum): byed par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
88a6('bum): ci'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du bgyis shing / ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su'ang 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bog par mi 'gyur
88a7('bum): ba dang / kha ton byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
88b1('bum): 'di la bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / 'di skad du nged kyis ji ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yin te/ ji skad du khyed klog pa de ni
88b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes dbyen byed cing bzlog la mos pa med par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de la bdud sdig te can gyis de ltar dbyen byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
88b3('bum): gang lung ma bstan pa de dag ni the tshom skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag the tshom du gyur nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri bar 'gyur/ mi klog par 'gyur/ lung mi 'bog par 'gyur/
88b4('bum): kha ton mi byed par 'gyur/ mi sgom par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
88b5('bum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong
88b6('bum): gi cha byad du byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs shing 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
88b7('bum): zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed par 'gyur te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
89a1('bum): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ni rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ des tshig de thos nas shes rab kyi
89a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/
89a3('bum): de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bar chad du
89a4('bum): 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las mang du 'byung ste/ bdud kyi las de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rig par byas nas rnam par spang
89a5('bum): bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdud kyi las byang chub sems
89a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bgyi ste/ spang par bgyi ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
89a7('bum): gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
89b1('bum): brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/
89b2('bum): rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las te/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste/ rnam par spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
89b3('bum): gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste/ rnam par spang bar
89b4('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
89b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
89b6('bum): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
89b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang
90a1('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
90a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang gis/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
90a3('bum): bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems
90a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nye bar bsnyen te/ de'ang de la dga' ba skyed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
90a5('bum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs
90a6('bum): rgyas kyi cha byed du lus gser gyi kha dog dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan par byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90a7('bum): po'i drung du 'ongs te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mos pa skyed do/ /des mos pa bskyed nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par
90b1('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
90b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong
90b3('bum): gi dge 'dun nye bar ston te/ des de la 'dod pa bskyed cing / bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur shog
90b4('bum): cig / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis chos ji ltar ston pa
90b5('bum): de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos bstan par bya'o/ /zhes de de la 'dod pa bskyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
90b6('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
90b7('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag du ma/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma/ sbyin pa'i
91a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
91a2('bum): pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de lta bu dag nye bar ston te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba de dag la
91a3('bum): 'dod pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /des de dag la 'dod pa bskyed nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
91a4('bum): zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bsgom pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
91a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gzugs med do/ /tshor ba med do/ /'du shes
91a6('bum): med do/ /'du byed med do/ /rnam par shes pa med do/ /mig med do/ /rna ba med do/ /sna med do/ /lce med do/ /lus med do/ /yid med do/ /gzugs med do/ /sgra med do/ /dri med
91a7('bum): do| |ro med do/ /reg med do/ /chos med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /lus
91b1('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
91b2('bum): med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
91b3('bum): med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /sa'i khams med do/ /
91b4('bum): chu'i khams med do/ /me'i khams med do/ /rlung gi khams med do/ /nam mkha'i khams med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /ma rig pa med do/ /'du byed med do/ /rnam par
91b5('bum): shes pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs med do/ /skye mched drug med do/ /reg pa med do/ /tshor ba med do/ /sred pa med do/ /len pa med do/ /srid pa med do/ /skye ba med do/ /rga shi med do/ /
91b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
91b7('bum): tu phyin pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do/ /chen po stong
92a1('bum): pa nyid med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
92a2('bum): med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid
92a3('bum): stong pa nyid med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do/ /dran
92a4('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med do/ /dbang po rnams med do/ /stobs rnams med do/ /byang chub kyi yan
92a5('bum): lag rnams med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do/ /bsam gtan rnams med do/ /tshad med pa rnams med do/ /
92a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
92a7('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
92b1('bum): stobs bcu med do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi med do/ /byams pa chen po med do/ /snying rje chen po med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
92b2('bum): med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid med do/ /rang byang chub med do/ /thams
92b3('bum): cad shes pa nyid med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do/ /rab 'byor/ gang la gzugs med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub
92b4('bum): sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la tshor ba med pa de la sangs
92b5('bum): rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la
92b6('bum): 'du shes med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong
92b7('bum): ngo| |gang la 'du byed med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad
