93a1('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan
93a2('bum): thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la mig med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs
93a3('bum): rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rna ba med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
93a4('bum): med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la sna med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang
93a5('bum): chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la lce med pa de la sangs
93a6('bum): rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la
93a7('bum): lus med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
93b1('bum): gyis stong ngo / /gang la yid med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni
93b2('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la gzugs med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
93b3('bum): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la sgra med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
93b4('bum): 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la dri med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i
93b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la ro med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos
93b6('bum): med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la reg med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs
93b7('bum): rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la chos med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
94a1('bum): med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la mig gi rnam
94a2('bum): par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang
94a3('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos
94a4('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i
94a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs
94a6('bum): rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang

101a7('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /
101b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la dgra bcom pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas
101b2('bum): med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rang byang chub med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
101b3('bum): med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
101b4('bum): med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong
101b5('bum): ngo|| ||shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya dgu pa/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bar chad du 'gyur
101b6('bum): ba mang ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
101b7('bum): byed pa de dag la'ang bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ngo / /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling 'di rin po che gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel
102a1('bum): dang | byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing phyir rgol ba mang ba dag go /rab 'byor/ de
102a2('bum): bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin
102a3('bum): du yid la byed pa de dag la'ang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
102a4('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni de bzhin te/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni de bzhin te/ dzam+bu'i gling 'di rin po che gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel
102a5('bum): dang | byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing slar rgol ba mang ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du rigs
102a6('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de
102a7('bum): dag la'ang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /slar rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu
102b1('bum): glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du
102b2('bum): yid la bgyid pa dag gi bar chad bgyid pa ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu glen pa de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/
102b3('bum): skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul
102b4('bum): bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gi bar chad bgyid pa de dag ni blo rgya shin tu chung par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs pa che dag la de dag gi sems mi 'jug go /de dag ni shes rab
102b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri/ mi klog/ lung mi 'bog kha ton mi bgyid/ mi sgom/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi bgyid de/ gzhan 'dri zhing klog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa
102b6('bum): dang | ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dag la'ang bar chad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi
102b7('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri mi klog/ lung mi 'bog/ kha ton mi byed/ mi sgom/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing / gzhan 'dri ba dang /
103a1('bum): klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag gi bar chad byed pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis
103a2('bum): brlabs pa ste/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu chung ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsgrubs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
103a3('bum): gyis yongs su ma zin pa sha stag 'byung ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
103a4('bum): zab mo 'di mi 'dri/ mi klog /lung mi 'bog/ kha ton mi byed/ mi sgom/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing / gzhan 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang /

103a7('bum): la bdud kyi las 'di dag kyang 'byung med kyi 'on kyang / rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog cing kha
103b1('bum): ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
103b2('bum): dang | bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa

103b5('bum): par byed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su

104a1('bum): dang | ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gong du dran pa nye bar
104a2('bum): bzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dbang
104a3('bum): po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan

108a4('bum): kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung
108a5('bum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems
108a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa
108a7('bum): dang | kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa'
108b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha
108b2('bum): ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bud med la la
108b3('bum): zhig la bu lnga'am/ bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ brgya'am/ stong zhig yod na/ de dag gi ma de ca nis kyang mi na bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed
108b4('bum): cing | bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na nad med par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di la ji ltar na bar chad du mi 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bdag cag
108b5('bum): gi ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar bya na ji ltar bya/ bdag cag gi ma 'di lus la mi bde ba'i nyams med par bya na ji ltar bya/ 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa ste/ srog gi sbyin bdag go zhes de dag
108b6('bum): ma de la rim gro legs par bya bas rim gro byed do/ /de dag ni 'di'i srog ga bar chad du gyur du 'ong ngo / /lus nyams chung bar gyur du 'ong ngo / /lus la sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrul
108b7('bum): gyis gtse ba'i mi bde bas bab tu 'ong ngo / /tsha ba dang / grang ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas mi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes phu dung legs par bya bas phu dud du byed do/ /de ltar bu de
109a1('bum): dag ma de la 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa'o/ /'di ni 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o zhes bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rgyun du rim gro byed cing / bsti stang
109a2('bum): dang | bkur sti tsher byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
109a3('bum): la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
109a4('bum): cad skyed skyed pa'o/ /'jig rten 'di ston ston pa'o zhes rgyun du gzigs shing dgongs so/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin
109a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes
109a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i ri klung gi bye ma
109a7('bum): snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
109b1('bum): 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
109b2('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs
109b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten
109b4('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs
109b5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
109b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos
109b7('bum): ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /shar lho'i
110a1('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
110a2('bum): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu
110a3('bum): rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
110a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzang mo 'di la sangs rgyas
110a5('bum): kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
110a6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
110a7('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de
110b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes
110b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag

110b4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
110b5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed skyed pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di'ang ston ston pa'o/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa
110b6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /de
110b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di las byung ba ni brtson
111a1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di las byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di las
111a2('bum): byung ba ni spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba
111a3('bum): ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'di las
111a4('bum): byung ba ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni dor ba
111a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di
111a6('bum): las byung ba ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni dngos po med pa'i
111a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /
111b1('bum): 'di las byung ba ni dbang po rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni stobs rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
111b2('bum): brgyad pa'o/ /'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni bsam gtan rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni tshad med pa rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni gzugs
111b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /'di las byung ba ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /'di las byung ba ni/
111b4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /'di las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /'di
111b5('bum): las byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag
111b6('bum): par rig pa rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po'o/ /'di las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o/ /'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni/
111b7('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di las byung ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /
112a1('bum): 'di las byung ba ni rang byang chub bo/ /'di las byung ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /'di las byung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
112a2('bum): chub bo/ /'di las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba rnams so/ /'di las byung ba
112a3('bum): ni dgra bcom pa rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
112a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de dag thams cad ni shes
112a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
112a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing
112a7('bum): klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bsgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
112b1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
112b2('bum): de dag la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par
112b3('bum): mi 'gyur bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba mdzad do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
112b4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten ston pa'o zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na shes
112b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
112b6('bum): pas 'jig rten ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun pa lags/ 'jig rten ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang la
112b7('bum): gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sde bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed do/ /so so
113a1('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed do/ /byams pa chen po bskyed do/ /snying rje chen po bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed do/ /
113a2('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid bskyed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bskyed do/ /rab 'byor/ chos de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs par
113a3('bum): brjod de/ rab 'byor/ de bas rga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
113a4('bum): pa'i 'jig rten gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ phung po ldan de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du gsungs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
113a5('bum): 'das| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mos phung po lnga ni ji ltar bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji ltar phung po lnga ston pa lags/ bcom
113a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po lnga po 'di dag 'jig par ston pa ma yin/ rab tu 'jig par ston pa ma yin te/ skye zhes bya bar mi ston to/ /
113a7('bum): 'gag ces bya bar mi ston to/ /kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya bar mi ston to/ /rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi ston to/ /'phel zhes bya bar mi ston to/ /'grib ces bya bar mi ston to/ /
113b1('bum): blang zhes bya bar mi ston to/ /dor zhes bya bar mi ston to/ /'das zhes bya bar mi ston to/ /ma 'ongs zhes bya bar mi ston to/ /da ltar byung zhes bya bar mi ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
113b2('bum): stong pa nyid la 'jig pa med do/ rab tu 'jig pa med do/ /mtshan ma med pa la 'jig pa med do/ /rab tu 'jig pa med do/ /smon pa med pa la 'jig pa med do/ /rab tu 'jig pa
113b3('bum): med do/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'jig pa'am rab tu 'jig pa med do/ /skye ba med pa la 'jig pa'am rab tu 'jig pa med do/ /dngos po med pa la 'jig pa'am rab tu 'jig
113b4('bum): pa med do/ /rang bzhin med pa la 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten ston par gsungs te/
113b5('bum): rab 'byor/ sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems dang spyod pa mkhyen pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten cing rab tu mkhyen te/ rab 'byor/
113b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni sems can med do/ /sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med do/ /gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba
113b7('bum): med do/ /tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /'du shes med do/ /'du shes su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /'du byed med do/ /'du byed du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rnam

114a6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi
114a7('bum): rnam par shes pa med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /
114b1('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te
114b2('bum): reg pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med
114b3('bum): do| |lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
114b4('bum): gyis tshor ba med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
114b5('bum): tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg
114b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg
114b7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /
115a1('bum): sa'i khams med do/ /sa'i khams su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams med do/ /chu'i khams su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams med
115a2('bum): do| |me'i khams su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams med do/ /rlung gi khams su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams med do/ /nam mkha'i khams su
115a3('bum): gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /ma rig pa med do/ /ma rig par gdags pa mi
115a4('bum): dmigs so/ /'du byed med do/ /'du byed du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa med do/ /rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /ming dang
115a5('bum): gzugs med do/ /ming dang gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /skye mched drug med do/ /skye mched drug tu gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /reg pa med do/ /reg par gdags
115a6('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba med do/ /tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /sred pa med do/ /sred par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /len pa med do/ /len par gdags pa mi
115a7('bum): dmigs so/ /srid pa med do/ /srid par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /skye ba med do/ /skye bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rga shi med do/ /rga shir gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /
115b1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par
115b2('bum): gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /brtson
115b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /shes rab
115b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid med do/ /nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid
115b5('bum): med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do/ /stong pa
115b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid med do/ /don dam pa stong pa
115b7('bum): nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do/ /'dus ma byas stong
116a1('bum): pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /thog
116a2('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags
116a3('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid du
116a4('bum): gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do/ /mi dmigs
116a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do/ /ngo bo nyid
116a6('bum): stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med do/ /
116a7('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams med do/ /yang dag par spong bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med
116b1('bum): do| |rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /dbang po rnams med do/ /dbang por gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams med do/ /stobs su gdags pa mi dmigs
116b2('bum): so| |byang chub kyi yan lag rnam su med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag tu gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
116b3('bum): brgyad par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do/ /'phags pa'i bden par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams med do/ /bsam
116b4('bum): gtan du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa rnams med do/ /tshad med par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do/ /gzugs
116b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad med do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
116b6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
116b7('bum): med pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams med do/ /mngon par shes par
117a1('bum): gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams med do/ /ting nge 'dzin du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do/ /gzungs kyi
117a2('bum): sgor gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams med

120a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg

121a3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ nang stong par nyid yod pa'am

122a4('bum): par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ so so
122a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ byams pa chen po yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ snying rje chen po yod pa'am dmigs
122a6('bum): par lta ga la 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ thams cad shes pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/
122a7('bum): lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur// //shes
122b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya dgu pa/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang sems can gang ji snyed cig gdags pas gdags su yod pa/ gzugs yod
122b2('bum): pa'am gzugs med pa'am/ 'du shes yod pa'am 'du shes med pa'am/ 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin/ 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs
122b3('bum): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi'ang rung ste/ de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sems bsdus pa dang spros par yang dag pa ji lta
122b4('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/
122b5('bum): rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni chos nyid kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
122b6('bum): 'das| de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa chos nyid gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
122b7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni chos nyid gang la chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sems bsdus pa dang spros pa lta smos kyang mi smos pa'i chos nyid des/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de
123a1('bum): dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
123a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs
123a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ de
123a4('bum): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni zad pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du

123a6('bum): dang bral ba'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de
123a7('bum): dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni 'gog pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
123b1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni spong ba'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs
123b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni zhi ba'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab
123b3('bum): ' byor| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros pa ni dben pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba
123b4('bum): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang spros
123b5('bum): pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi
123b6('bum): sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems
123b7('bum): la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang
124a1('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
124a2('bum): tu mkhyen to/ /gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la
124a3('bum): gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
124a4('bum): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta
124a5('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/
124a6('bum): gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
124a7('bum): pa| rab 'byor/ sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems ni yang dag pa
124b1('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med do/ /sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'am/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems dmigs
124b2('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ sems zhe sdang dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems ni yang dag
124b3('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med de/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na/ sems zhe sdang dang bcas pa'am/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa
124b4('bum): lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ sems gti mug dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems ni yang dag
124b5('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med de/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na/ gti mug dang bcas pa'am/ gti mug dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig
124b6('bum): smos| de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/ sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems
124b7('bum): zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /
125a1('bum): gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ ji
125a2('bum): l tar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
125a3('bum): ce na| rab 'byor/ sems 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni sems kyi 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
125a4('bum): rab 'byor/ sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la/ 'dod chags
125a5('bum): dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems zhe sdang dang bral
125a6('bum): ba la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ sems zhe sdang dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ sems kyi zhe sdang dang
125a7('bum): bcas pa nyid ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bral ba nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
125b1('bum): pas sems can de dag gi sems zhe sdang dang bral ba la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pas
125b2('bum): sems can de dag gi sems gti mug dang bral ba la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ sems gti mug dang bral
125b3('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni/ sems kyi gti mug dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/ gti mug dang bral ba nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/

125b5('bum): to| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la/ sems rgya che
125b6('bum): zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang gang zag
125b7('bum): pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la sems rgya che zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
126a1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems de rgya che bar mi 'gyur/ sems de rgya chung bar mi 'gyur/ sems de
126a2('bum): 'phel bar mi 'gyur/ sems de 'grib par mi 'gyur/ sems de 'ong bar mi 'gyur/ sems de 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ sems de dngos po med pas rgya che bar 'gyur ba ma yin/
126a3('bum): rgya chung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'grib par 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'ong bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'gro bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen
126a4('bum): to| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems la gang gis rgya chen por 'gyur ba'am/ rgya chung bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'phel bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'grib par 'gyur ba'am/ 'ong

126a7('bum): to| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol

127a7('bum): mi gzigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems kyi rgyud ni rten med cing tshad med pa ste/ sems kyi rgyud de dag la gang la gnas par bya ba'i rten med pa'i phyir te/
127b1('bum): rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang /

127b6('bum): mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mtshan nyid med pa'i sems la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi

128a6('bum): tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga la sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems de dag snang bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar
128a7('bum): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha
128b1('bum): rol gyi sems bltar med pa la bltar med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

128b6('bum): rol po de dag gi sems 'phro ba dang / 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa gang ji snyed cig skye zhing 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang gzugs la brten/ tshor ba la brten/ 'du
128b7('bum): shes la brten/ 'du byed la brten/ rnam par shes pa la brtan pas skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol po de dag gi sems de dag
129a1('bum): rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu

129a4('bum): bkram pa dang / bcum pa rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ bdag dang 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /
129a5('bum): de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten mi rtag ces bya ba de nyid
129a6('bum): bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni
129a7('bum): rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten rtag kyang rtag la/ mi rtag kyang mi rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la
129b1('bum): gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag
129b2('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi rtag pa'ang ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du shes la
129b3('bum): gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med
129b4('bum): pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas
129b5('bum): pa'o| |bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /
129b6('bum): de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa'ang yin la/ mtha' dang mi
129b7('bum): ldan pa'ang yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /
130a1('bum): de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin
130a2('bum): zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du byed
130a3('bum): la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /lus de srog dang ldan zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /
130a4('bum): de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /srog kyang gzhan la lus
130a5('bum): kyang gzhan zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /
130a6('bum): de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas yod ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya
130a7('bum): ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /
130b1('bum): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas med ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas yod kyang yod la med kyang med ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas
130b2('bum): yod par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin/ med par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba la gnas
130b3('bum): pa'o| |de ni 'du shes la gnas pa'o/ /de ni 'du byed la gnas pa'o/ /de ni rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
130b4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems
130b5('bum): 'phro ba dang / 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
130b6('bum): pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ gzugs mkhyen te/ gzugs ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ mtshan ma
130b7('bum): med cing byed pa med de/ spros pa med cing de gnyis su med pa de ltar mkhyen to/ /tshor ba mkhyen te/ tshor ba ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'gyur
131a1('bum): ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ mtshan ma med cing byed pa med de/ spros pa med cing dmigs su med pa de ltar mkhyen to/ /'du shes
131a2('bum): mkhyen te/ 'du shes ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ mtshan ma med cing byed pa med de/ spros pa
131a3('bum): med cing dmigs su med pa de ltar mkhyen to/ /'du byed mkhyen te/ 'du byed ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing / rnam par
131a4('bum): rtog pa med la/ mtshan ma med cing byed pa med de/ spros pa med cing dmigs su med pa de ltar mkhyen to/ /rnam par shes pa mkhyen te/ rnam par shes pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na/
131a5('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ mtshan ma med cing byed pa med de/ spros pa med cing dmigs su med pa ji ltar mkhyen to/ /
131a6('bum): rab 'byor/ de bzhin du bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang / 'du
131a7('bum): ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa rnams kyang de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin mkhyen to/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mkhyen to/ /'gyur ba med pa ji lta ba de bzhin
131b1('bum): du mkhyen to/ /rnam par rtog pa med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mkhyen to/ /mtshan ma med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mkhyen to/ /byed pa med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mkhyen to/ /spros pa med pa
131b2('bum): ji lta ba de bzhin du mkhyen to/ /dmigs su med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mkhyen to/ /de ltar na 'phro ba dang / 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
131b3('bum): pa de ni phung po'i de bzhin nyid do/ /phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni khams kyi de bzhin nyid
131b4('bum): do| |khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid do/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad
131b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
131b6('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid do/ /byang chub
131b7('bum): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/ /bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa
132a1('bum): bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/ /tshad med pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/ /
132a2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid do/ /mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
132a3('bum): ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid do/ /
132a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid
132a5('bum): do| |rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de
132a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag
132a7('bum): par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid do/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid
132b1('bum): gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid do/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /sangs rgyas
132b2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
132b3('bum): pa de ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi
132b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
132b5('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /zag pa dang bcas
132b6('bum): pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma
132b7('bum): 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas dang
133a1('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i
133a2('bum): 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
133a3('bum): bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /dgra
133a4('bum): bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de
133a5('bum): bzhin nyid do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
133a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa nyid de tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mi zad pa ste/ mi zad pa'i phyir gnyis su med de gnyis
133a7('bum): su byar med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /
133b1('bum): rab 'byor/ de lta bas nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa'o/ /'jig rten 'di ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa
133b2('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid thugs su chud
133b3('bum): do| |de bzhin nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ chos
133b4('bum): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor
133b5('bum): ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid des na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub brjod cing smos so/ bcom ldan 'das/ slar mi ldog pa'i byang
133b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ma gtogs par su zhig 'di la mos
133b7('bum): par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la gsungs pa ni shin tu zab bo/ /bcom
134a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di lta de ltar de bzhin nyid ni mi zad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir mi zad ce na/ chos thams cad mi zad pa'i phyir
134a2('bum): te| rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
134a3('bum): par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la gsungs te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu
134a4('bum): gnyis pa'o/ / //de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lta'i bu gang ji snyed pa de
134a5('bum): dag lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye mas mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig
134a6('bum): tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'dod pa ne spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lta'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
134a7('bum): ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
134b1('bum): stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i
134b2('bum): mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mngon par
134b3('bum): 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
134b4('bum): ni 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol
134b5('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes
134b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ /
134b7('bum): lha'i bu dag/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i
135a1('bum): bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi brdar bka' stsal te/
135a2('bum): don dam par ni ma yin no/ /lha'i bu dag/ mtshan nyid de dag ni lta dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis gzhan du bya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang mi
135a3('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang mtshan nyid der zad de/ lha'i bu dag/ mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid gzhan du mi byed do/ /mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid shes par mi byed do/ /
135a4('bum): mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med par shes par mi byed do/ /mtshan nyid med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa shes par mi byed do/ /de ltar mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid yod pa
135a5('bum): dang / mtshan nyid med pa de gnyis ka la'ang gang gis shes par bya ba dang / gang shes par bya ba dang / gang shes par byed pa de lta bu mi srid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs
135a6('bum): kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /tshor bas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /'du shes kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /'du byed kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pas 'du byas pa ma yin
135a7('bum): no/ /khams kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /skye mched kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma
135b1('bum): yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma
135b2('bum): yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /phyi stong
135b3('bum): pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin
135b4('bum): no| |don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /mtha'
135b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /rang
135b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /mi dmigs pa
135b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
136a1('bum): nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong bas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi
136a2('bum): rkang pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /dbang pos 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /stobs kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /'phags
136a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /tshad med pas 'du
136a4('bum): byas pa ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
136a5('bum): par 'jug pa dgus 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /mtshan ma med pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /smon pa med pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /
136a6('bum): mngon par shes pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sogs 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus
136a7('bum): 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /byams pa chen pos 'du byas pa ma yin
136b1('bum): no| |snying rje chen pos 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /
136b2('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /rang byang
136b3('bum): chub kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /mtshan
136b4('bum): nyid de dag ni mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyis ma
136b5('bum): yin te/ lha'i bu dag/ la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gang yin zhes zer na/ ci ste yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
136b6('bum): de ni ma lags te/ yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra ba ma lags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du/ nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid gang yang
136b7('bum): ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid
137a1('bum): med pa'i dbyings de ni de bzhin du gnas so/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ma nor bar mngon par
137a2('bum): sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lta'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
137a3('bum): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mtshan nyid de dag mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa chos thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis par
137a4('bum): ' jug cing mtshan nyid de dag la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thams
137a5('bum): cad kyi chags pa las 'das pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bstan pas/
137a6('bum): mtshan nyid rnams rab tu bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid zab mo mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
137a7('bum): zab mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur te/ de la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
137b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
137b2('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu dbye ba mdzad do/ /'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi
137b3('bum): mtshan nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mig gi mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i mtshan nyid dang / lce'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi mtshan nyid dang / yid kyi mtshan
137b4('bum): nyid dang / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / sgra'i mtshan nyid dang / dri'i mtshan nyid dang / ro'i mtshan nyid dang / reg gi mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
137b5('bum): mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
137b6('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lce'i 'dus
137b7('bum): te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i
138a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
138a2('bum): ba'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid
138a3('bum): dang | chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams
138a4('bum): kyi mtshan nyid dang / ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / skye mched drug gi mtshan
138a5('bum): nyid dang / reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sred pa'i mtshan nyid dang / len pa'i mtshan nyid dang / srid pa'i mtshan nyid dang / skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rga shi'i
138a6('bum): mtshan nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi
138a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / phyi stong
138b1('bum): pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan
138b2('bum): nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
138b3('bum): nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
138b4('bum): pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
138b5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mtshan nyid dang / dbang po'i mtshan
138b6('bum): nyid dang / stobs kyi mtshan nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi mtshan nyid dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid
138b7('bum): dang | bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid dang / tshad med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mtshan nyid dang / mthar gyis
139a1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mtshan nyid dang / stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / smon pa med pa'i
139a2('bum): mtshan nyid dang / mngon par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i mtshan nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid
139a3('bum): dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang / byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid dang / snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dang / sangs
139a4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
139a5('bum): 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad
139a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba mdzad pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i
139a7('bum): lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag/ gzugs ni gzhig tu rung ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
139b1('bum): rgyas so/ /tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid do/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /
139b2('bum): de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan
139b3('bum): nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rnam par shes pa ni so so'i bye brag shes pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par
139b4('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /phung po rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /
139b5('bum): khams rnams mi gdug pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /skye mched rnams ni 'byung pa'i sgo'i mtshan
139b6('bum): nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin
139b7('bum): gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /lha'i bu dag/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs
140a1('bum): pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /lha'i bu dag/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid
140a2('bum): de| de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin
140a3('bum): gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs
140a4('bum): pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yang dag par sdud pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs
140a5('bum): pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan
140a6('bum): nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dag ni mi 'khrugs pa'i
140a7('bum): mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni 'byung ba'i mtshan
140b1('bum): nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin
140b2('bum): gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan
140b3('bum): nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med
140b4('bum): par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'grel pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par
140b5('bum): sangs rgyas so/ /stobs rnams ni shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /
140b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin tu brtan pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
140b7('bum): rnams ni yongs su mi chod pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /byams pa chen po ni phan pa sgrub pa'i
141a1('bum): mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /snying rje chen po ni skyob pa'i mtshan nyid
141a2('bum): de| de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /dga' ba chen po ni rab tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs
141a3('bum): pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /btang snyoms chen po ni ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon
141a4('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi 'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par
141a5('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon par gyi mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs
141a6('bum): par sangs rgyas so/ /lha'i bu dag/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
141a7('bum): ni chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can zhes bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba/ /bam po nyis brgya bcu pa/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
141b1('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten 'di
141b2('bum): ston pa'o/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di la brten cing rnam par spyod do/ /
141b3('bum): chos de la rim gror mdzad cing / mchod pa mdzad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rim gro mdzad pa dang / bkur sti mdzad pa dang / phu dud mdzad pa dang /
141b4('bum): mchod pa mdzad pa de ni chos dang ldan pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ste/ rab 'byor/ de
141b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa mkhyen pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa
141b6('bum): dgongs pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang la la zhig yang dag par smra bas byas pa shes shing / byas pa dran pa'o zhes smra na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa dgongs pa'o zhes
141b7('bum): yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra'o/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa dgongs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
142a1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gang gis byon pa dang / lam gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
142a2('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur ba'i theg pa de nyid dang / lam de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rim gro mdzad pa dang / bkur sti mdzad pa dang / phu dud mdzad pa dang / mchod pa
142a3('bum): mdzad pa dang / yongs su srung ba mdzad pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa mkhyen pa dang / byas pa dgongs par blta'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
142a4('bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la brten te/ byed pa po med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ lus
142a5('bum): med pa'i phyir/ ma byas pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/ chos thams cad
142a6('bum): la bya ba med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa mkhyen pa dang / byas pa dgongs pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol
142a7('bum): tu phyin pa la brten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes byas pa med pa chos thams cad la 'jug pa med pa'i brdas 'jug
