170a3('bum): kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam
170a4('bum): par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
170a5('bum): bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa
170a6('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi
170a7('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mi 'jigs pa
170b1('bum): bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i
170b2('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
170b3('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
170b4('bum): bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig
170b5('bum): rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las
170b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
170b7('bum): pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ /ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo
171a1('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du
171a2('bum): byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mig gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna
171a3('bum): ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'jig rten
171a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sgra'i 'jig rten ngo bo
171a5('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dri'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ro'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
171a6('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes
171a7('bum): pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
171b1('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mig
171b2('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo
171b3('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid
171b4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te
171b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus
171b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus
171b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong
172a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /me'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
172a2('bum): to| |nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig rten
172a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ming dang
172a4('bum): gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye mched drug gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
172a5('bum): ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sred pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /len pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
172a6('bum): ston to/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
172a7('bum): to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i
172b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
172b2('bum): phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid

172b6('bum): ston to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

173b3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes

173b5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig
173b6('bum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
173b7('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
174a1('bum): ston to/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /
174a2('bum): rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
174a3('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
174a4('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi

176b7('bum): ston to/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
177a1('bum): bar ston to/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
