177a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi
177b1('bum): 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
177b2('bum): to| |rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig
177b3('bum): rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po
177b4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig
177b5('bum): rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i
177b6('bum): 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
177b7('bum): bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /
178a1('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten
178a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos
178a3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
178a4('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes
178a5('bum): bya bar ston te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /
178a6('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi
178a7('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /mig gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya
178b1('bum): bar ston te/ /lus kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sgra'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya
178b2('bum): bar ston to/ /dri'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /ro'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /
178b3('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
178b4('bum): to| |lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
178b5('bum): to| |mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /
178b6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /
178b7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg
179a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus
179a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sa'i khams kyi
179a3('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /me'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi
179a4('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi
179a5('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
179a6('bum): ston to/ /skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sred pa'i 'jig rten
179a7('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /len pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i 'jig
179b1('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha
179b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
179b3('bum): bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
179b4('bum): ston to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
179b5('bum): to| |don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
179b6('bum): to| |mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi
179b7('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang gi mtshan
180a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po med pa stong pa
180a2('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
180a3('bum): to| |dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig
180a4('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig
180a5('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
180a6('bum): to| |bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
180a7('bum): kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya
180b1('bum): bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes
180b2('bum): bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten
180b3('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i
180b4('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun du zhugs
180b5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
180b6('bum): bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes
180b7('bum): bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing /
181a1('bum): 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ji
181a2('bum): ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig
181a3('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mig gi 'jig rten stong pa
181a4('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lus
181a5('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sgra'i 'jig rten stong pa
181a6('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dri'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ro'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /reg gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /
181a7('bum): chos kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid
181b1('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par
181b2('bum): shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
181b3('bum): bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg
181b4('bum): pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya
181b5('bum): bar ston to/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya
181b6('bum): bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
181b7('bum): to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
182a1('bum): to/ /sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /me'i khams kyi 'jig
182a2('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par
182a3('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
182a4('bum): to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /skye mched drug gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
182a5('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sred pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
182a6('bum): ston to/ /len ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i
182a7('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid
182b1('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /bsam
182b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
182b3('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
182b4('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/
182b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
182b6('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
182b7('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /
183a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /
183a2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
183a3('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten
183a4('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /
183a5('bum): stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
183a6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
183a7('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya
183b1('bum): bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
183b2('bum): to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong
183b3('bum): pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs
183b4('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten
183b5('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
183b6('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
183b7('bum): bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya
184a1('bum): bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam
184a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing / 'jig rten ston
184a3('bum): pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya bcu gsum pa/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig
184a4('bum): rten ji ltar ston ce na/ ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
184a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba'am/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
184a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad
184a7('bum): du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha
184b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar
184b2('bum): gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor/
184b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas
184b4('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
184b5('bum): pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
184b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i don to/ /rab
184b7('bum): 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab
185a1('bum): 'byor/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas nyid dang /
185a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin
185a3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
185a4('bum): phyin pa don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /
185a5('bum): rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag par nus pa de lta bu gang yang med de/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin
185a6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
185a7('bum): pa don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni
185b1('bum): gzhal du med de/ sus kyang gzhal bar mi nus so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
185b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa
185b3('bum): yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pas mnyam pa'ang su'ang med na/ lhag pa lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor/
185b4('bum): rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye
185b5('bum): bar gnas so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
185b6('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/
185b7('bum): sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs
186a1('bum): pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu med/ gzhal du med de/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs kyang
186a2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
186a3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'du shes kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed kyang bsam gyis mi
186a4('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
186a5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ mig kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab
186a6('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ sna'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /
186a7('bum): rab 'byor/ lce'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
186b1('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs
186b2('bum): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ sgra'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
186b3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ dri'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ ro'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
186b4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ reg kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos
186b5('bum): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
186b6('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
186b7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
187a1('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
187a2('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab
187a3('bum): 'byor/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang bsam gyis
187a4('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
187a5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
187a6('bum): pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
187a7('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
187b1('bum): dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i
187b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang
187b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
187b4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
187b5('bum): dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ sa'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ chu'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi
187b6('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ me'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
187b7('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rlung gi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
188a1('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
188a2('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ ma rig pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed
188a3('bum): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
188a4('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ ming dang gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
188a5('bum): skye mched drug kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ reg pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
188a6('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ sred
188a7('bum): pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ len pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
188b1('bum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ srid pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ skye ba'ang bsam
188b2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rga shi'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
188b3('bum): mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi
188b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab
188b5('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
188b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
188b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
189a1('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
189a2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ stong pa
189a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
189a4('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
189a5('bum): mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
189a6('bum): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
189a7('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
189b1('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam
189b2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
189b3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ mi dmigs
189b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
189b5('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /
189b6('bum): rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
189b7('bum): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
190a1('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
190a2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/dbang po rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ stobs rnams
190a3('bum): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
190a4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
190a5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ bsam
190a6('bum): gtan rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshad med pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
190a7('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
190b1('bum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
190b2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
190b3('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ mngon par shes pa rnams
190b4('bum): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
190b5('bum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de
190b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang bsam
190b7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
191a1('bum): ste| |mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ byams pa chen po'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
191a2('bum): pa'o| |rab 'byor/ snying rje chen po'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
191a3('bum): rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
191a4('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
191a5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
191a6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rang byang chub kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
191a7('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
191b1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos
191b2('bum): thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems mi dmigs
191b3('bum): so/ /sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs
191b4('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'du shes bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
191b5('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang
191b6('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig bsam
191b7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
192a1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ rab 'byor/ sna bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi
192a2('bum): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lce bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab
192a3('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
192a4('bum): mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sgra
192a5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dri bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
192a6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ro bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
192a7('bum): reg bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
192b1('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
192b2('bum): pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i
192b3('bum): rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
192b4('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
192b5('bum): mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab
192b6('bum): 'byor/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam
192b7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
193a1('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
193a2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi
193a3('bum): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi
193a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
193a5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
193a6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi
193a7('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
193b1('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa gzhal du med
193b2('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs
193b3('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ me'i khams bsam gyis mi
193b4('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
193b5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab
193b6('bum): 'byor/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ma rig pa bsam gyis
193b7('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
194a1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
194a2('bum): mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab
194a3('bum): 'byor/ skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
194a4('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
194a5('bum): pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ len pa bsam
194a6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
194a7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab
194b1('bum): 'byor/ rga shi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ spyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi
194b2('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
194b3('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
194b4('bum): mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs
194b5('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab
194b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
194b7('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
195a1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
195a2('bum): dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs
195a3('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ don dam pa stong pa
195a4('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
195a5('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
195a6('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
195a7('bum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
195b1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang
195b2('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
195b3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
195b4('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
195b5('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
195b6('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
195b7('bum): pa'ang ma dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi
196a1('bum): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang
196a2('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /
196a3('bum): rab 'byor/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dbang
196a4('bum): po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab
196a5('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
196a6('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
196a7('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
196b1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs
196b2('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
196b3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis
196b4('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam
196b5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa'i sgro stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
196b6('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mngon par shes pa rnams
196b7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
197a1('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
197a2('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
197a3('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
197a4('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
197a5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /
197a6('bum): rab 'byor/ snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
197a7('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
197b1('bum): bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab
197b2('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
197b3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs
197b4('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
197b5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
197b6('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du/ gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
197b7('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam
198a1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam
198a2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
198a3('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
198a4('bum): slad du mig bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba bsam gyis mi
198a5('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
198a6('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce bsam gyis ma khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
198a7('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
198b1('bum): du yid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
198b2('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sgra bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
198b3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dri bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
198b4('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du ro bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg bsam
198b5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
198b6('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
198b7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
199a1('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi
199a2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
199a3('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
199a4('bum): pa ma dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
199a5('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
199a6('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
199a7('bum): ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
199b1('bum): slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ma dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus
199b2('bum): te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam
199b3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam
199b4('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam
199b5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam
199b6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam
199b7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam
200a1('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te
200a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sa'i khams
200a3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
200a4('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du me'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
200a5('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam
200a6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
200a7('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
200b1('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
200b2('bum): 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab
200b3('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
200b4('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
200b5('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
200b6('bum): slad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab
200b7('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du len pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
201a1('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
201a2('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
201a3('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
201a4('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
201a5('bum): ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
201a6('bum): ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
201a7('bum): slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
201b1('bum): slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
201b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa
201b3('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
201b4('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
201b5('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
201b6('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam
201b7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
202a1('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam
202a2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
202a3('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
202a4('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
202a5('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
202a6('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
202a7('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
202b1('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
202b2('bum): ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos
202b3('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa
202b4('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
202b5('bum): pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsam
202b6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi
202b7('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
203a1('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab
203a2('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
203a3('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
203a4('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
203a5('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
203a6('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
203a7('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
203b1('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
203b2('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang
203b3('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang
203b4('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
203b5('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang
203b6('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
203b7('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
204a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
204a2('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
204a3('bum): du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams
204a4('bum): pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po bsam
204a5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
204a6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam
204a7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
204b1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi
204b2('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
204b3('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
204b4('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
204b5('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
204b6('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya bcu bzhi pa/ /
204b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
205a1('bum): tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'du shes la'ang bsam pa
205a2('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
205a3('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig
205a4('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/rna ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
205a5('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i la'ang
205a6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
205a7('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs
205b1('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sgra la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
205b2('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dri la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ro la'ang bsam pa
205b3('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ reg la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
205b4('bum): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa
205b5('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
205b6('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
205b7('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi rnam par shes
206a1('bum): pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag
206a2('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
206a3('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i
206a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang
206a5('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
206a6('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig
206a7('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i 'dus te
206b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
206b2('bum): ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang
206b3('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
206b4('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
206b5('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sa'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chu'i khams la'ang
206b6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ me'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
206b7('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rlung gi khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha'i
207a1('bum): khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang
207a2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ma rig pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
207a3('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes
207a4('bum): pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ming dang gzugs la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang
207a5('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ skye mched drug la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
207a6('bum): reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
207a7('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sred pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ len pa

207b2('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ skye ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rga shi la'ang bsam pa
207b3('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
207b4('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ bzod

207b6('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
207b7('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab
208a1('bum): 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid
208a2('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang
208a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /

208a6('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
