214b2('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
214b3('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos
214b4('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
214b5('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang
214b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
214b7('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams la bsam pa dang
215a1('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag
215a2('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
215a3('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
215a4('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad med pa rnams
215a5('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa
215a6('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
215a7('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
215b1('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
215b2('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
215b3('bum): ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
215b4('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa
215b5('bum): dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
215b6('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
215b7('bum): ci'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang
216a1('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs ba lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam
216a2('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang
216a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
216a4('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
216a5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa
216a6('bum): dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
216a7('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
216b1('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
216b2('bum): phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
216b3('bum): du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'du shes kyi
216b4('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
216b5('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la
216b6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
216b7('bum): med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig
217a1('bum): gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig la bsam pa dang dpag
217a2('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
217a3('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
217a4('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /
217a5('bum): rab 'byor/ lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
217a6('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
217a7('bum): ste/ de'i phyir lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
217b1('bum): med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
217b2('bum): gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
217b3('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sgra la
217b4('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi
217b5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
217b6('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rol bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
217b7('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ reg gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
218a1('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa
218a2('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo
218a3('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang
218a4('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
218a5('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i rnam par shes
218a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
218a7('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam
218b1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi rnam par
218b2('bum): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
218b3('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam
218b4('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi 'dus
218b5('bum): te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa
218b6('bum): dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
218b7('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
219a1('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang
219a2('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/
219a3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi
219a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag
219a5('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi
219a6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi
219a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
219b1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid
219b2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
219b3('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
219b4('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lce'i 'dus te
219b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
219b6('bum): ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
219b7('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
220a1('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
220a2('bum): du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
220a3('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag
220a4('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
220a5('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
220a6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir me'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
220a7('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung gi khams la bsam
220b1('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/
220b2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes
220b3('bum): pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag
220b4('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa
220b5('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
220b6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa
220b7('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam
221a1('bum): par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ming dang gzugs
221a2('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
221a3('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam
221a4('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ reg pa'i
221a5('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
221a6('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la
221a7('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sred ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
221b1('bum): la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ len pa'i ngo bo
221b2('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
221b3('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir srid pa la bsam pa
221b4('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal tu med la/ mi mnyam pa
221b5('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rga shi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
221b6('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rga shi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
221b7('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
222a1('bum): phyin pa la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
222a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa
222a3('bum): dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/
222a4('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
222a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
222a6('bum): tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
222a7('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
222b1('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
222b2('bum): de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
222b3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
222b4('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid la
222b5('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
222b6('bum): med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ stong
222b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa
223a1('bum): dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
223a2('bum): gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab
223a3('bum): 'byor/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la
223a4('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
223a5('bum): gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
223a6('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa
223a7('bum): nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
223b1('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
223b2('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
223b3('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dor ba
223b4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
223b5('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam
223b6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams
223b7('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa
224a1('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
224a2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
224a3('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
224a4('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po
224a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang
224a6('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi
224a7('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med
224b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
224b2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
224b3('bum): med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
224b4('bum): so/ /rab 'byor/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba
224b5('bum): rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
224b6('bum): med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /
224b7('bum): rab 'byor/ dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag
225a1('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
225a2('bum): du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ byang
225a3('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa
225a4('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
225a5('bum): med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
225a6('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
225a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
225b1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
225b2('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshad med
225b3('bum): pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
225b4('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
225b5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa
225b6('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mthar gyis
225b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar gyis gnas
226a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa'i
226a2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam
226a3('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
226a4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam
226a5('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
226a6('bum): la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzungs
226a7('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa
226b1('bum): dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam
226b2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mi 'jigs
226b3('bum): pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang
226b4('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam
226b5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ byams pa chen po'i
226b6('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
226b7('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje
227a1('bum): chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
227a2('bum): brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa
227a3('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
227a4('bum): du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /
227a5('bum): rab 'byor/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lan gcig phyir
227a6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi
227a7('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
227b1('bum): pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid
227b2('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/
227b3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa
227b4('bum): shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
227b5('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/
227b6('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// //
227b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya bco lnga pa/ /rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
228a1('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
228a2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ 'du shes gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes
228a3('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par
228a4('bum): shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gang bsam gyis
228a5('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
228a6('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba dmigs su yod dam/ sna gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna dmigs su
228a7('bum): yod dam/ lce gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce dmigs su yod dam/ lus gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
228b1('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmigs su yod dam/ yid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
228b2('bum): de la yid dmigs su yod dam/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod dam/ sgra gang
228b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgra dmigs su yod dam/ dri gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
228b4('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dri dmigs su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ro dmigs su yod
228b5('bum): dam/ reg gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg dmigs su yod dam/ chos gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
228b6('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
228b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
229a1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
229a2('bum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
229a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
229a4('bum): dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
229a5('bum): mnyam pa de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
229a6('bum): pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna
229a7('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te
229b1('bum): reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su
229b2('bum): yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/
229b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi 'dus
229b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod
229b5('bum): dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
229b6('bum): ba dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg
229b7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
230a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
230a2('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam
230a3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sa'i khams gang bsam
230a4('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sa'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ chu'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
230a5('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chu'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ me'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
230a6('bum): pa de la me'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ rlung gi khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gi khams dmigs
230a7('bum): su yod dam/ nam mkha'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nam mkha'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ rnam
230b1('bum): par shes pa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su yod dam/ ma rig pa gang bsam
230b2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ma rig pa dmigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
230b3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par
230b4('bum): shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ ming dang gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ming dang gzugs dmigs su yod dam/
230b5('bum): skye mched drug gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye mched drug dmigs su yod dam/ reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab
230b6('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
230b7('bum): pa de la tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sred pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sred pa dmigs su yod dam/ len pa gang
231a1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la len pa dmigs su yod dam/ srid pa gang bsam
231a2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la srid pa dmigs su yod dam/ skye ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
231a3('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye ba dmigs su yod dam/ rga shi gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
231a4('bum): de la rga shi dmigs su yod dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sbyin pa'i pha
231a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshul
231a6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
231a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
231b1('bum): de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
231b2('bum): mnyam pa de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
231b3('bum): dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
231b4('bum): pa de la nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi stong pa nyid
231b5('bum): dmigs su yod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod
231b6('bum): dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/
231b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ don dam pa stong pa
232a1('bum): nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ 'dus
232a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ 'dus ma byas stong
232a3('bum): pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
232a4('bum): nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ thog ma dang tha ma
232a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/
232a6('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rang
232a7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ chos thams cad stong
232b1('bum): pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
232b2('bum): nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa
232b3('bum): nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa
232b4('bum): nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang
232b5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang
232b6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang
232b7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ yang dag par spong ba gang bsam
233a1('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la yang dag par spong ba rnams dmigs su yod dam/ rdzu 'phrul
233a2('bum): gyi rkang pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ dbang po gang bsam gyis
233a3('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dbang po rnams dmigs su yod dam/ stobs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
233a4('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la stobs rnams dmigs su yod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
233a5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de dag la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste
233a6('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
233a7('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ bsam gtan gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
233b1('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la bsam gtan rnams dmigs su yod dam/ tshad med pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med ba ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
233b2('bum): pa de dag la tshad med pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
233b3('bum): pa de dag la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
233b4('bum): pa de dag la rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
233b5('bum): mnyam pa de dag la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang bsam
233b6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su yod
233b7('bum): dam/ mngon par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ ting
234a1('bum): nge 'dzin gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su yod dam/
234a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su yod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
234a3('bum): stobs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su yod dam/ mi 'jigs
234a4('bum): pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa
234a5('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su yod dam/ byams pa chen
234a6('bum): po gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la byams pa chen po dmigs su yod dam/ snying rje chen po gang bsam gyis mi
234a7('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la snying rje chen po dmigs su yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang bsam gyis mi
234b1('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su yod dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang
234b2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su yod dam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang
234b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su yod dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang
234b4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su yod dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab
234b5('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rang byang chub gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
234b6('bum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang byang chub dmigs su yod dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
234b7('bum): mnyam pa de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
235a1('bum): pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
235a2('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bas na rnam grangs 'dis chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
235a3('bum): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /dpag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o/ /tshad dang bral
235a4('bum): ba'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o/ /mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na chos thams cad bsam gyis
235a5('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa las
235a6('bum): yongs su 'das pas na/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na dpag tu med pa'o/ /tshad las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal du med pa'o/ /mnyam
235a7('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni bsam du med pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rab
235b1('bum): 'byor/ dpag tu med ces bya ba 'di ni dpag tu mi rung ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhal du med ces bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rab 'byor/ mi mnyam
235b2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pas mnyam pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ba'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi
235b3('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /dpag tu med
235b4('bum): ces bya ba ni nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhal du med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ro/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mi mnyam
235b5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang
235b6('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa'am dpag par mi nus te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal du med do/ /sangs rgyas
235b7('bum): kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du med do/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / mi mnyam
236a1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma brgya phrag
236a2('bum): nyi shus nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol la/ /dge bsnyen stong phrag drug cu dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum cu sa ni chos rnams la rdul
236a3('bum): dang bral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi mig rnam par dag go / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shus ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
236a4('bum): bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu gsum pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
236a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi
236a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /
236b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de
236b2('bum): bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab
236b3('bum): pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye
236b4('bum): bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
236b5('bum): zab mo 'dir ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'dus so/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni nang stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /phyi stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /phyi nang stong pa
236b6('bum): nyid 'dus so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /chen po stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
236b7('bum): 'dus so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /chos
237a1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /
237a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi 'dus so/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dus so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi
237a3('bum): rkang pa bzhi 'dus so/ /dbang po lnga 'dus so/ /stobs lnga 'dus so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so/ /'phags pa'i
237a4('bum): bden pa bzhi 'dus so/ /bsam gtan bzhi 'dus so/ /tshad med pa bzhi 'dus so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dus so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dus
237a5('bum): so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dus so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'dus so/ /mngon par
237a6('bum): shes pa rnams 'dus so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus so/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dus so/ /
237a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dus so/ /byams pa chen po 'dus so/ /snying rje chen po 'dus so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
237b1('bum): 'bras bu 'dus so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus so/ /rang byang chub 'dus so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa

275b5('bum): mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o/ /rna ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o/ /sna la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /

276a4('bum): mi bya'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /yongs su gzung

279b5('bum): dka' ba ste/ mi brtag pa la brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ zhi zhing phra ba la mkhas pa dang / byang ba dang yid gsal bas 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can
279b6('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
279b7('bum): 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
280a1('bum): kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa
280a2('bum): dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su gyur te/ de dag thams cad la ye shes dang spong ba gang ji snyed cig mchis
280a3('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos shing / bsams te gzhal ba dang / brtag pa dang dpyad pa gnyis ni/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol
280a4('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos pa de nyid mchis lags pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang
280a5('bum): ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ /chos kyi rjes su 'brang
280a6('bum): ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ /brgyad
280a7('bum): pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ /
280b1('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ /

280b7('bum): bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la

281a7('bum): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ji
281b1('bum): tsam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ /lha'i bu dag/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang
281b2('bum): rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas 'dri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni myur du
281b3('bum): 'byung bar shes par bya'i/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral pa/ mdo sde gzhan la bskal pa dang /
281b4('bum): bskal pa'i lhag mar spyod pa dag ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phul du bya ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos
281b5('bum): kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba
281b6('bum): dang / gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
281b7('bum): bslabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
282a1('bum): de dag rgya cher bstan to/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ched du brjod pas ched du brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das/
282a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
282a3('bum): phyin pa'o/ /'di ni gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
282a4('bum): mo de la bslabs shing / dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung
282a5('bum): bar 'gyur/ brgyad pa rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba
282a6('bum): rnams byung bar gyur to/ /'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung
282a7('bum): zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs shing rang sangs rgyas rnams byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
282b1('bum): chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu byung bar gyur te/ 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni 'grib pa'am/
282b2('bum): 'phel bar yang mi gda' 'o zhes nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/
282b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ste/ de dag shin tu'ang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas mi snang bar gyur te/
282b4('bum): 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do/ /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni/ gzugs yod pa'i khams su 'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
282b5('bum): rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma
282b6('bum): thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing / gong du 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ de gang nas shi 'phos
282b7('bum): te/ 'dir skyes par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
283a1('bum): 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la/ rmongs par mi 'gyur zhing the tshom mi za/ nem nur mi byed la/ shes
283a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par dga' zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang yid la bya ba de dag dang mi 'bral la/ yid la bya ba
283a3('bum): de dag 'gro 'am/ 'ong ngam/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rung ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jig par mi byed cing / chos smra ba'i gang zag de la'ang rtag tu rgyun
283a4('bum): mi 'chad par 'brang ste/ rab 'byor/ dper na/ ba drus ma be'u mi 'dor ba ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
283a5('bum): 'di'i don du/ nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mngon du ma byas/ dran pas 'dris par ma byas/ yid kyis rtogs par ma byas/ lta bas shin tu khong du chud par ma byas
283a6('bum): kyi bar du chos smra ba de mi gtong na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa ba'i gang zag de ni mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
283a7('bum): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu des sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang /
283b1('bum): kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par gyur to/ /gong du'ang bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
283b2('bum): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byas par gyur to/ /bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas par gyur to/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis
283b3('bum): mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas/ mi'i nang du skyes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la'ang thos ma thag tu mos par gyur par blta'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
283b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing / mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bog pa dang / kha
283b5('bum): ton bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa las yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa las shi 'phos te/ 'dir
283b6('bum): skyes pa de lta bu'i rnam grangs mchis sam/ ma mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
283b7('bum): chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa las de nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag
284a1('bum): tu mos par 'gyur ro/ /mos par byas nas kyang 'dri'o/ /bris nas kyang lung 'bog go /kha ton byed do/ /tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
284a2('bum): ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so/ /thos nas kyang bzung
284a3('bum): ngo / /bcangs so/ /yongs su bcangs so/ /bklags so/ /kun chub par byas so/ /kha ton du byas so/ /tshul bzhin du yid la byas so/ /de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang / yid la byed pa
284a4('bum): de nyid kyis 'dir skyes pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam pa las shi 'phos nas/ mi'i
284a5('bum): nang du mi dang bskal pa mnyam par skyes na'ang de ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
284a6('bum): dpa' chen po des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dri ba dang / yongs su brtag pa byas pas/ de
284a7('bum): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes bar rig par bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya bcu bdun pa/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
284b1('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab
284b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
284b3('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byes pa de ni/ shes
284b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan

289a7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/
