289b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
289b6('bum): theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas
289b7('bum): pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /
290a1('bum): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar mngon par shes pa lnga thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs
290a2('bum): su brtag pa mi byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam
290a3('bum): pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar ting nge 'dzin rnams thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs
290a4('bum): su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam
290a5('bum): pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar gzungs kyi sgo rnams thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs
290a6('bum): su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam
290a7('bum): pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thos kyang yongs su
290b1('bum): ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems
290b2('bum): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar mi 'jigs pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/
290b3('bum): yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems
290b4('bum): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su
290b5('bum): ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/
290b6('bum): sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar byams pa chen po thos kyang yongs su ma
290b7('bum): dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/
291a1('bum): sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar snying rje chen po
291a2('bum): thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems
291a3('bum): zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos
291a4('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs
291a5('bum): par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar
291a6('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/
291a7('bum): rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon
291b1('bum): gyi mthar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/
291b2('bum): rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar
291b3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ /yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa da ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem
291b4('bum): nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang
291b5('bum): gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas te/ nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi
291b6('bum): 'am/ lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dra zhing rtog pa dang / nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis
291b7('bum): sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te/ yongs su dri ba dang yang mi
292a1('bum): ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su
292a2('bum): ma dris/ yongs su ma brtags/ rjes su 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa la de tsam gyis dge ba'i bsam pa dang / mos
292a3('bum): pa skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni bar bar mos shing / bar bar mos pa med par 'gyur te/ de ni ldam ldem gyi blo des 'phrogs shing / shing bal gyi gzegs ma bzhin du
292a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas theg pa la zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
292a5('bum): yongs su ma bzung ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni shes rab kyi
292a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos/ kha ton du ma byas la tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas te/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /bsam
292a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /tshul khrims kyi
292b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid
292b2('bum): la ma bslabs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid
292b3('bum): la ma bslabs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /
292b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma
292b5('bum): bslabs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /dngos po med pa'i
292b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la ma bslabs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
292b7('bum): la ma bslabs so/ /dbang po rnams la ma bslabs so/ /stobs rnams la ma bslabs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma bslabs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
293a1('bum): brgyad pa la ma bslabs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ma bslabs so/ /bsam gtan rnams la ma bslabs so/ /tshad med pa rnams la
293a2('bum): ma bslabs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma bslabs so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
293a3('bum): pa dgu la ma bslabs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ma bslabs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la ma bslabs
293a4('bum): so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la ma bslabs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la
293a5('bum): ma bslabs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma bslabs so/ /byams pa chen po la ma bslabs so/ /snying rje chen po la ma bslabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
293a6('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
293a7('bum): bu la ma bslabs so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /rang byang chub la ma bslabs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
293b1('bum): pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /rab 'byor/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/ de ni dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam
293b2('bum): dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'am/ klog pa'am/ lung 'bog pa'am/ kha ton du bya ba'am/ tshul bzhin du
293b3('bum): yid la bya bar mi nus so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri zhing lung mi 'bog pa
293b4('bum): dang / kha ton mi byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas
293b5('bum): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
293b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan
293b7('bum): mi 'dogs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la
294a1('bum): phan mi 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa
294a2('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
294a3('bum): kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs
294a4('bum): pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
294a5('bum): kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / ngo
294a6('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
294a7('bum): kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa
294b1('bum): dang / dbang po rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs
294b2('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan
294b3('bum): rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshad med pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan
294b4('bum): mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /
294b5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs
294b6('bum): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus
294b7('bum): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / byams pa
295a1('bum): chen pos gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
295a2('bum): kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs
295a3('bum): pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs
295a4('bum): pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
295a5('bum): phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
295a6('bum): pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi
295a7('bum): spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dang mthun par
295b1('bum): mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa
295b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang
295b3('bum): mthun par mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi
295b4('bum): spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar
295b5('bum): bzhag pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ dbang po rnams dang mthun par
295b6('bum): mi spyod/ stobs rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'phags
295b7('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
296a1('bum): rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang mthun par mi
296a2('bum): spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ ting nge
296a3('bum): 'dzin rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun par mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi
296a4('bum): dang mthun par mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spyod/ byams pa chen po dang mthun par mi spyod/ snying rje chen po dang mthun par mi spyod/ sangs
296a5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/
296a6('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ rang byang chub dang mthun par mi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang mthun
296a7('bum): par mi spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod na/ de ni gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po las sa gcig la gnas par 'gyur te/ de ni 'di ltar nyan
296b1('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma
296b2('bum): dris/ ma bstan/ kha ton du ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phan ma btags/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs
296b3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mthun par mi spyad pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis
296b4('bum): dang / sa gnyis po de las gcig la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu bzhi pa'o// //rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig la mi rnams shing ngam/ shing dum mam/ shing leb bam/ rkyal pa'am/ ro la mi 'ju/ mi 'dzin na/ rab 'byor/
296b5('bum): mi de dag ni/ rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin par dus byed par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ mi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa'i tshe/ shing ngam/ shing dum mam/
296b6('bum): shing leb bam/ rkyal pa'am/ ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par mi 'gyur te/ bde zhing nyam nyos med par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par
297a1('bum): 'gyur te/ ma nyes ma nyams par thad la phyin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
297a2('bum): bu mo dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi
297a3('bum): byed cing mi brten pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
297a4('bum): tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
297a5('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / sbyin
297a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / nang stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
297a7('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
297b1('bum): mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed
297b2('bum): cing mi brten pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du
297b3('bum): mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / 'dus ma
297b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
297b5('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / dor ba
297b6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du
297b7('bum): yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
298a1('bum): pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi
298a2('bum): byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang /
298a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du
298a4('bum): mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa
298a5('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du
298a6('bum): mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / dbang po rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / stobs
298a7('bum): rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid
298b1('bum): la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
298b2('bum): pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la
298b3('bum): mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / tshad med pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
298b4('bum): rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed
298b5('bum): cing mi brten pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
298b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi 'dri
298b7('bum): mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa
299a1('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
299a2('bum): bcu mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi
299a3('bum): byed cing mi brten pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / byams pa chen po mi 'dri
299a4('bum): mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / snying rje chen po mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa
299a5('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/
299a6('bum): kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi
299a7('bum): brten pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams
299b1('bum): par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du byed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
299b2('bum): pa pa gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don du dad pa yod cing / bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
299b3('bum): dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / mi gtong ba'ang yod cing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o/ /lung 'bog go /kha ton du byed do/ /
299b4('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/ /rten par byed do/ /de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yod/ bzod pa
299b5('bum): yod/ mos pa yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/ dga' ba yod/ spro ba yod/ mi gtong ba yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yod pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
299b6('bum): phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha
299b7('bum): rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis
300a1('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis
300a2('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
300a3('bum): ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
300a4('bum): su bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
300a5('bum): bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
300a6('bum): su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pas yongs su
300a7('bum): bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang pos yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongs su bzung
300b1('bum): ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
300b2('bum): bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad med pas yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis
300b3('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas
300b4('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
300b5('bum): stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su
300b6('bum): bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba
300b7('bum): dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ bar ma dor nye zho med par nyan thos kyi sa las 'das/
301a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ sems can yongs su smin par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
301a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bud med dam skyes pa la la zhig bum pa ma bsregs shing / so ma
301a3('bum): btang bas chu bcu bar sems na/ rab 'byor/ bum pa de ni ring por mi gnas te/ myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bum pa de so ma
301a4('bum): btang ba'i phyir te/ de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la'ang bla na med pa
301a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ dga'
301a6('bum): ba'ang yod/ spro ba'ang yod/ mi gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas
301a7('bum): pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
301b1('bum): pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
301b2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don
301b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
301b4('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
301b5('bum): bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos
301b6('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar
301b7('bum): bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs
302a1('bum): su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas
302a2('bum): yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs
302a3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus
302a4('bum): yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa lngas yongs su ma bzung /
302a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / mi 'jigs
302a6('bum): pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung /
302a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
302b1('bum): bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur
302b2('bum): bar shes par bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya bcu dgu pa/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
302b3('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bar ma dor nye zho 'byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
302b4('bum): skyes pa'am bud med la la zhig bum pa so legs par btang bas chu klung ngam/ mtsho 'am mtshe'u 'am/ khron pa nas chu 'chu na/ rab 'byor/ chu 'chu ba de'i bum pa des ni bde
302b5('bum): bar khyim du phyin par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang
302b6('bum): yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod/ spro ba'ang yod/ mi gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod la/ de'ang
302b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
303a1('bum): pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
303a2('bum): pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
303a3('bum): kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus ma
303a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa
303a5('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs
303a6('bum): su bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po
303a7('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar bzhag pas yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs
303b1('bum): su bzung / dbang pos yongs su bzung / stobs kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung /
303b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung / tshad med pas yongs su bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su
303b3('bum): bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
303b4('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung / de bzhin
303b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs
303b6('bum): su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gyi
303b7('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/
304a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te/ ma nyes ma nyams par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
304a2('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho'i gru ma bsdams shing / zag klan ma byas par rdzas bcug ste chu la btang na/ rab 'byor/
304a3('bum): gru de zhig par 'gyur te/ gru'ang logs shig /rdzas kyang logs shig tu song nas/ de ltar tshong pa de thabs mi mkhas pas/ gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / rin
304a4('bum): po che chen po las yongs su 'phang bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
304a5('bum): kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod/ spro ba'ang yod/ mi gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor
304a6('bum): ba'ang yod mod kyi/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
304a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i
304b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa
304b2('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma
304b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong
304b4('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
304b5('bum): bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i
304b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
304b7('bum): rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags
305a1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
305a2('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar
305a3('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon
305a4('bum): par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
305a5('bum): bcus yongs su ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje
305a6('bum): chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
305a7('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor
305b1('bum): 'gyur te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i don chen po dang bral zhing rin po che chen po las 'phang bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
305b2('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi bar ma dor nye zho gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul
305b3('bum): can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru shin tu bsdams shing shin tu bstar ba chu la gtong zhing rdzas 'jug na/ rab 'byor/ rgya mtsho'i gru de ni bar ma dor zhig par mi 'gyur te/ gru
305b4('bum): des phyogs gang du bgrod pa der phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
305b5('bum): pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod/ spro ba'ang yod/ mi gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson

307a1('bum): chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/

308b1('bum): ldang nus su lags kyang / rgyang grags gcig gam/ rgyang grags gnyis su'ang mchi bar mi nus te/ de rgas pa dang / bro 'tshal bas nyams dmas pa'i slad du/ khri las ldang nus su lags
