416a2('bum): 'byor/ skyes bu'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni skyes bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
416a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gang zag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gang zag kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i
416a4('bum): phyir go cha de ni gang zag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni shed can dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
416a5('bum): rab 'byor/ shed can yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni shed can dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
416a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni shed bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shed bdag kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med
416a7('bum): pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni shed bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byed pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de
416b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byed pa po'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byed pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub
416b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshor ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ tshor ba po'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/
416b3('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni tshor ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni shes pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
416b4('bum): rab 'byor/ shes pa po'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni shes pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
416b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mthong ba po'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i
416b6('bum): phyir go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de
416b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma
417a1('bum): yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
417a2('bum): rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin
417a3('bum): zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
417a4('bum): phyin pa'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
417a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu med
417a6('bum): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
417a7('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems
417b1('bum): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni shes rab
417b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de
417b3('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
417b4('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
417b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyi stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems
417b6('bum): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni phyi stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid
417b7('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid
418a1('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
418a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin
418a3('bum): zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni chen po stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang
418a4('bum): shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
418a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
418a6('bum): go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'dus
418a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go
418b1('bum): cha de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de
418b2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin
418b3('bum): zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mtha' las
418b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
418b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
418b6('bum): pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang
418b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med
419a1('bum): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
419a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems
419a3('bum): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni chos thams
419a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha
419a5('bum): de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa
419a6('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong
419a7('bum): pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
419b1('bum): rab 'byor/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
419b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/
419b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de
419b4('bum): ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ngo bo
419b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de
419b6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
419b7('bum): nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya nyer lnga pa/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
420a1('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/
420a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
420a3('bum): go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/
420a4('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma
420a5('bum): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang
420a6('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dbang po rnams
420a7('bum): kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
420b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha
420b2('bum): de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
420b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub
420b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
420b5('bum): pa'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
420b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub
420b7('bum): sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bsam
421a1('bum): gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bsam gtan rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go
421a2('bum): cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshad med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
421a3('bum): rab 'byor/ tshad med pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni tshad med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang
421a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
421a5('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab
421a6('bum): 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang shin tu
421a7('bum): med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
421b1('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang shin tu
421b2('bum): med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
421b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam par thar
421b4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
421b5('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel
421b6('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang
421b7('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin
422a1('bum): rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
422a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang
422a3('bum): med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
422a4('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni de
422a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de
422a6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /
422a7('bum): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa
422b1('bum): rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
422b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byams pa chen po'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/
422b3('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
422b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ snying rje chen po'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa' go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang
422b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang
422b6('bum): shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
422b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems
423a1('bum): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
423a2('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems
423a3('bum): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha
423a4('bum): de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa' go cha'ang med pas/ de'i
423a5('bum): phyir go cha de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa
423a6('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel
423a7('bum): pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rang byang chub kyang
423b1('bum): shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
423b2('bum): go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/
423b3('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
423b4('bum): nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam
423b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag
423b6('bum): gis/ sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos ba de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/
423b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
424a1('bum): rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i
424a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ldang ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
424a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/ sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod
424a4('bum): kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan
424a5('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems
424a6('bum): can nyi tshe nyung zad zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
424a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
424b1('bum): dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
424b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go bgos pa ma yin/ ye shes cung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
424b3('bum): dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol
424b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ ci'ang bsgom par mi bgyi/ gang du'ang bsgom par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi
424b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa'am/ gang bsgom par bgyi ba'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan
424b6('bum): 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad
424b7('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
425a1('bum): pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
425a2('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
425a3('bum): 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
425a4('bum): pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
425a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol pa
425a6('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig bsgom pa rnam
425a7('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
425b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
425b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
425b3('bum): pa 'di ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
425b4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dri bsgom
425b5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
425b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
425b7('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
426a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
426a2('bum): 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par
426a3('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
426a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
426a5('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
426a6('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
426a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te
426b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom
426b2('bum): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
426b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
426b4('bum): pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg
426b5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom
426b6('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
426b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
427a1('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni me'i khams
427a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
427a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
427a4('bum): pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par
427a5('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
427a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
427a7('bum): ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
427b1('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
427b2('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom
427b3('bum): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
427b4('bum): pa 'di ni srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'a di ni skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan
427b5('bum): 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
427b6('bum): pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom
427b7('bum): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
428a1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom pa rnam
428a2('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
428a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed can bsgom pa rnam
428a4('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
428a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba po
428a6('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
428a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
428b1('bum): 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
428b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
428b3('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
428b4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
428b5('bum): / phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan
428b6('bum): 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
428b7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa
429a1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
429a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
429a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus ma
429a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
429a5('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan
429a6('bum): 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
429a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams
429b1('bum): cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
429b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
429b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong
429b4('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
429b5('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
429b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
429b7('bum): ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
430a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
430a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags
430a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par
430a4('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
430a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs med
430a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam
430a7('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
430b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
430b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
430b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa
430b4('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
430b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
430b6('bum): ni so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par
430b7('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
431a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
431a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
431a3('bum): 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i
431a4('bum): 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
431a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
431a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
431a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta
431b1('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba
431b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
431b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes
431b4('bum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
431b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna bsgom pa
431b6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
431b7('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab
432a1('bum): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes
432a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dri bsgom pa rnam par
432a3('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
432a4('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
432a5('bum): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
432a6('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa
432a7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
432b1('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
432b2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
432b3('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
432b4('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa
432b5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
432b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
432b7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
433a1('bum): gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
433a2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa
433a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
433a4('bum): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
433a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i
433a6('bum): khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
433a7('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam
433b1('bum): mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
433b2('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
433b3('bum): 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab
433b4('bum): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
433b5('bum): 'di ni skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
433b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa
433b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
434a1('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye ba bsgom
434a2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
434a3('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
434a4('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
434a5('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
434a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gang
434a7('bum): zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
434b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po bsgom
434b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
434b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthong ba po bsgom
434b4('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
434b5('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
434b6('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
434b7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
435a1('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
435a2('bum): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
435a3('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom
435a4('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
435a5('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
435a6('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid
435a7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab
435b1('bum): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
435b2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dor ba
435b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
435b4('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
435b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mi dmigs
435b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
435b7('bum): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
436a1('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
436a2('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba bsgom
436a3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
436a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stobs
436a5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
436a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
436a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan
436b1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
436b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
436b3('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
436b4('bum): 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
436b5('bum): pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
436b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
436b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par
437a1('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta
437a2('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
437a3('bum): ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
437a4('bum): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
437a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lan gcig
437a6('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
437a7('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
437b1('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam
437b2('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan
437b3('bum): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon/
437b4('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor/ byang chub
437b5('bum): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
437b6('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes brtson 'grus kyi pha
437b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
438a1('bum): mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab
438a2('bum): 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'
438a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes sbyin
438a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la mngon
438a5('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
438a6('bum): chen po phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub
438a7('bum): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes phyi nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
438b1('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems
438b2('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes chen po stong pa
438b3('bum): nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par
438b4('bum): chags pa med dam zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
438b5('bum): po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
438b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
438b7('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes mtha' las
439a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
439a2('bum): d pa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
439a3('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
439a4('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
439a5('bum): pa med dam zhes rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
439a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /
439a7('bum): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems
439b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes mi
439b2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong
439b3('bum): pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
439b4('bum): d pa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
439b5('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
439b6('bum): nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon
439b7('bum): chags pa med dam zhes dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
440a1('bum): d pa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes yang dag par spong ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
440a2('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rdzu 'phrul
440a3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon
440a4('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes dbang po rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
440a5('bum): chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub
440a6('bum): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
440a7('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes
440b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
440b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab
440b3('bum): 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
440b4('bum): po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes tshad med pa rnams la byang chub
440b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
440b6('bum): mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang
440b7('bum): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam par thar pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
441a1('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par
441a2('bum): chags pa med dam zhes mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
441a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
441a4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon
441a5('bum): par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes mngon par shes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang
441a6('bum): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes ting nge 'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
441a7('bum): brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems
441b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med
441b2('bum): dam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
441b3('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes mi 'jigs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
441b4('bum): d pa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
441b5('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes byams pa chen po la byang chub sems
441b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes snying rje chen po
441b7('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon
442a1('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab
442a2('bum): 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
442a3('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes lam gyi rnam pa
442a4('bum): shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
442a5('bum): pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / //shes rab
442a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya nyer drug pa/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
442a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi
442b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
442b2('bum): mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ gti mug
442b3('bum): dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod
442b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/
442b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam zhes
442b6('bum): yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi
442b7('bum): dngang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga'
443a1('bum): la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab
443a2('bum): 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang /
443a3('bum): bzung shing bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
443a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par
443a5('bum): mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/ thos nas kyang gong du 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
443a6('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par
443a7('bum): mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
443b1('bum): pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
443b2('bum): nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol
443b3('bum): ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
443b4('bum): stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ mtshan ma med pa
443b5('bum): la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i
443b6('bum): bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang
443b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ skye ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
444a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
444a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
444a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
444a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
444a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
444a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
444a7('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
444b1('bum): mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
444b2('bum): 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
444b3('bum): la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ gzugs
444b4('bum): brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam
444b5('bum): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
444b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
444b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
445a1('bum): 'di la rtog pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
445a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
445a3('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
445a4('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye
445a5('bum): ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis
445a6('bum): pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa
445a7('bum): dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/
445b1('bum): de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol
445b2('bum): ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
445b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
445b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
445b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
445b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
445b7('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
446a1('bum): la rtog par 'gyur/ sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
446a2('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ /smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la
446a3('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
446a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
446a5('bum): po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags
446a6('bum): sam/ mig la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna la rtog pa lags sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid la rtog pa lags
446a7('bum): sam/ gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ ro la rtog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa
446b1('bum): lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i
