446b2('bum): rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la
446b3('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te
446b4('bum): reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
446b5('bum): tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus
446b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ chu'i khams
446b7('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ me'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i
447a1('bum): khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/
447a2('bum): ming dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags
447a3('bum): sam/ len pa la rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa
447a4('bum): lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog
447a5('bum): pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi stong
447a6('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ don dam
447a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
447b1('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags
447b2('bum): sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po
447b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag
447b4('bum): pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags
447b5('bum): sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags
447b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
447b7('bum): pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
448a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin
448a2('bum): rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la
448a3('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas
448a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad
448a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no//
448a6('bum): tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mig la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba
448a7('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sgra la
448b1('bum): rtog pa ma yin no/ /dri la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ro la rtog pa ma yin no/ /reg la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chos la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam
448b2('bum): par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi
448b3('bum): rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus
448b4('bum): te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin
448b5('bum): no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma
448b6('bum): yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chu'i khams
448b7('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no/ /me'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin
449a1('bum): no/ /ma rig pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ming dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /skye
449a2('bum): mched drug la rtog pa ma yin no/ /reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /len pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /srid pa la rtog pa
449a3('bum): ma yin no/ /skye ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
449a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /shes rab
449a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong
449a6('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
449a7('bum): nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa
449b1('bum): ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mi dmigs
449b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin
449b3('bum): no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dbang po rnams la rtog
449b4('bum): pa ma yin no/ /stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i
449b5('bum): bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
449b6('bum): rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
449b7('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
450a1('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par
450a2('bum): rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/ /snying rje chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin
450a3('bum): no/ /thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
450a4('bum): na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du'ang ma song / phyogs na'ang
450a5('bum): mi gnas/ yul na'ang mi gnas/ gang na'ang mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so/ /'gro ba dang 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gang la grangs mi dmigs shing / 'gro ba dang
450a6('bum): 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni/ gang gis kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /tshor bas ma yin no/ /'du shes kyis ma yin no/ /'du byed kyis ma yin
450a7('bum): no/ /rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /mig gis ma yin no/ /rna bas ma yin no/ /snas ma yin no/ /lces ma yin no/ /lus kyis ma yin no/ /yid kyis ma yin no/ /gzugs kyis
450b1('bum): ma yin no/ /sgras ma yin no/ /dris ma yin no/ /ros ma yin no/ /reg gis ma yin no/ /chos kyis ma yin no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /sna'i
450b2('bum): rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /rna
450b3('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no//
450b4('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
450b5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /sa'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /chu'i khams
450b6('bum): kyis ma yin no/ /me'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams kyis ma yin no/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /ma rig pas ma yin
450b7('bum): no/ /'du byed kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /ming dang gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /skye mched drug gis ma yin no/ /reg pas ma yin no/ /tshor bas ma yin no/ /sred pas
451a1('bum): ma yin no/ /len pas ma yin no/ /srid pas ma yin no/ /skye bas ma yin no/ /rga shis ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /tshul khrims
451a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /shes
451a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin
451a4('bum): no| |chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /mtha' las
451a5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /chos
451a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin
451a7('bum): no| |ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams
451b1('bum): kyis ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no/ /stobs rnams kyis ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma yin no/ /'phags
451b2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams kyis ma yin no/ /tshad med pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /gzugs
451b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i
451b4('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
451b5('bum): kyis ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ byams pa chen
451b6('bum): pos ma yin no/ /snying rje chen pos ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
451b7('bum): bus ma yin no/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rang byang chub kyis ma yin no/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa
452a1('bum): shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
452a2('bum): nyid do/ /tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam
452a3('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mig nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sna nyid kyang

457b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
457b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
458a1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
458a2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
458a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
458a4('bum): nyid gcig pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /phyi stong pa
458a5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
458a6('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
458a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
458b1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
458b2('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
458b3('bum): gcig pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mtha' las
458b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
458b5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
458b6('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
458b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
459a1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
459a2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
459a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
459a4('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
459a5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dran pa nye
459a6('bum): bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba
459a7('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin
459b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
459b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
459b3('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
459b4('bum): gcig pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
459b5('bum): pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /bsam gtan
459b6('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
459b7('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
460a1('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
460a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
460a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
460a4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
460a5('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
460a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
460a7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
460b1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
460b2('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
460b3('bum): nyid gcig pa'o/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /snying rje
460b4('bum): chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
460b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
460b6('bum): brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu bdun pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya nyer drug pa/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
460b7('bum): gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom
461a1('bum): ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to/ /gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
461a2('bum): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
461a3('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
461a4('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams
461a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes
461a6('bum): so/ /'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
461a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go /rna ba nyid rnam pa thams
461b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce nyid rnam pa thams
461b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so/ /yid nyid rnam
461b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs
461b4('bum): so/ /sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
461b5('bum): dri'o/ /ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
461b6('bum): kyang reg go / chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
461b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna
462a1('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o//
462a2('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
462a3('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
462a4('bum): nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus
462a5('bum): te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
462a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg
462a7('bum): pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa
462b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
462b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
462b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
462b4('bum): nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i
462b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te
462b6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
462b7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
463a1('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
463a2('bum): kyang me'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa
463a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
463a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du
463a5('bum): byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
463a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ /skye mched
463a7('bum): drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go /reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
463b1('bum): pa nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
463b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
463b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
463b4('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
463b5('bum): phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol
463b6('bum): tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
463b7('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
464a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
464a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi stong
464a3('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
464a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po
464a5('bum): stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
464a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus
464a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das
464b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
464b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
464b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos
464b4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
464b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
464b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong
464b7('bum): pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa
465a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa
465a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
465a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi
465a4('bum): rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
465a5('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang
465a6('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam
465a7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan
465b1('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
465b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i
465b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar gyis gnas
465b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar
465b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
465b6('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /
465b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
466a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
466a2('bum): nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so
466a3('bum): yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad
466a4('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen
466a5('bum): po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin
466a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba'i de
466a7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'du
466b1('bum): shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'du

466b3('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /

472a7('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

472b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dbang po rnams

472b5('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
472b6('bum): do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen a nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
472b7('bum): med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
473a1('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam

480a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
480a6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
480a7('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
480b1('bum): smon pa med pa'o/ mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa
480b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
480b3('bum): pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
480b4('bum): stobs rnams so/ /mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
480b5('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
480b6('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje
480b7('bum): chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// //
481a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya nyer brgyad pa/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
481a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
481a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang

488a1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
488a2('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
488a3('bum): gnyis su byar med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
488a4('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
488a5('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
488a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin
488a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /mthar
488b1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
488b2('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
488b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
488b4('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams
488b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
488b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
488b7('bum): gnyis su byar med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
489a1('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
489a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin
489a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /byams
489a4('bum): pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
489a5('bum): byar med do/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
489a6('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
489a7('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
489b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid
489b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /phyir mi 'ong
489b3('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
489b4('bum): byar med do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
489b5('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
489b6('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
489b7('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
490a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
490a2('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i de bzhin
490a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dgra bcom pa'i
490a4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /
490a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
490a6('bum): su byar med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
490a7('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
490b1('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /lha'i bu dag /don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te/ chos
490b2('bum): bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par
490b3('bum): dka' zhing brtag tu med la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mos mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par
490b4('bum): dka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu
490b5('bum): ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag /nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag/ de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
490b6('bum): bu dag / chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
490b7('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab
491a1('bum): bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mi skye mi 'gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag/
491a2('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mngon
491a3('bum): par 'du bya ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
491a4('bum): bu dag / sems can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /srog zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /'gro ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
491a5('bum): bu dag / gso ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /skyes bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /gang zag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu
491a6('bum): dag / shed can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag/ shed bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /byed pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
491a7('bum): bu dag / tshor ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /shes pa bo zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
491b1('bum): lha'i bu dag /gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /'du shes zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag/

491b4('bum): 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /yid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /sgra zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /

491b6('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
491b7('bum): lha'i bu dag /sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /lce'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /lus kyi rnam par
492a1('bum): shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mig gi 'dus
492a2('bum): te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab
492a3('bum): bo/ /lha'i bu dag /lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /yid kyi
492a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rna ba'i 'dus te
492a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /lce'i 'dus

492b6('bum): skye ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rga shi zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
492b7('bum): bu dag / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /brtson
493a1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
493a2('bum): bu dag / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /phyi stong pa nyid zab

493a4('bum): dag / chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /don dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /'dus byas stong pa
493a5('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab
493a6('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir
493a7('bum): chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
493b1('bum): bu dag / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /dngos po med
493b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab
493b3('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i

493b5('bum): bu dag / byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /'phags
493b6('bum): pa'i bden pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /tshad med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
493b7('bum): bu dag / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rnam par thar pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mthar gyis
494a1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
494a2('bum): dang / smon pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir chos
494a3('bum): 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu
494a4('bum): dag / mi 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /byams pa chen po zab
494a5('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab
494a6('bum): bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
494a7('bum): bu dag / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /dgra bcom pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rang byang chub zab
494b1('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos
494b2('bum): 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
494b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni gzugs gzung pa'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad
494b4('bum): du bstan pa ma lags/ /'du shes gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 'du byed gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa
494b5('bum): ma lags/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mig gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
494b6('bum): rna ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sna gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lce gzung ba'i slad du
494b7('bum): ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lus gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi
495a1('bum): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ gzugs gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sgra gzung ba'i slad
495a2('bum): du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ dri gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ ro gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi

495a7('bum): slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa gzung
495b1('bum): ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sna'i 'dus

498b5('bum): slad du bstan pa ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/

499a1('bum): ldan 'das/ 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugs so/ /bdag ni gzugs can no/ /bdag ni tshor ba'o/ /bdag gis tshor bar bya'o/ /bdag gi
499a2('bum): 'du shes so/ /bdag ni 'du shes can no/ /bdag gi 'du byed do/ /bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag gis rnam par shes par bya'o/ /bdag

500a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/ /bdag gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

500a4('bum): par ma 'das pa'o/ /bdag gi nam mkha'i khams so/ /bdag ni nam mkha'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /bdag ni rnam
500a5('bum): par shes pa'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/ /bdag gi ma rig pa'o/ /bdag ni ma rig pa can no/ /bdag gi 'du byed do/ /bdag ni 'du byed pa'o/ /bdag gi rnam
500a6('bum): par shes pa'o/ /bdag ni rnam par shes par byed pa'o/ /bdag gi ming dang gzugs so/ /bdag gi ming dang gzugs can no/ /bdag gi skye mched drug go/ /bdag ni skye

500b2('bum): shi'i chos can no/ /bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

500b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi phyi stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid la goms
500b7('bum): par bya'o/ /bdag gi phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la goms
501a1('bum): par bya'o/ /bdag gi chen po stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis
501a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi 'dus ma byas stong
501a3('bum): pa nyid do/ /bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la
501a4('bum): goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
501a5('bum): do/ /bdag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag

501a7('bum): stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag
501b1('bum): gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
501b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /bdag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la
501b3('bum): spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul
501b4('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi dbang po rnams so/ /bdag gis dbang po rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi stobs rnams so/ /bdag gis stobs rnams la spyad par

501b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi bsam
501b7('bum): gtan rnams so/ /bdag gis bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi tshad med pa rnams so/ /bdag gis tshad med pa rnams pa spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi gzugs med pa'i
502a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /
502a2('bum): bdag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bdag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
502a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
502a4('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag
502a5('bum): gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag
502a6('bum): gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /bdag gis mi
502a7('bum): 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi byams pa
502b1('bum): chen po'o/ /bdag gis byams pa chen po la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi snying rje chen po'o/ /bdag gis snying rje chen po la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
502b2('bum): rnams so/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi
502b3('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi dgra
502b4('bum): bcom pa nyid do/ /bdag ni dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rang byang chub bo/ /bdag ni rang byang chub nyid du 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rang sangs rgyas so/ /bdag ni rang sangs
502b5('bum): rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bdag ni
502b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya
502b7('bum): nyer dgu pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag /chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
503a1('bum): mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'du shes gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
503a2('bum): mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'du byed gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma
503a3('bum): yin/ mig gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rna ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sna gzung ba'i phyir
503a4('bum): bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lce gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i
503a5('bum): phyir ma yin/ yid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sgra gzung ba'i phyir
503a6('bum): bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ dri gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ ro gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung
503a7('bum): ba'i phyir ma yin/ reg gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ chos gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mig gi
503b1('bum): rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sna'i rnam
503b2('bum): par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus kyi rnam
503b3('bum): par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mig gi
503b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mi gzung pa'i phyir ma yin/ sna'i 'dus
503b5('bum): te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus
503b6('bum): te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te
503b7('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi
504a1('bum): gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lce'i 'dus
504a2('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma
504a3('bum): yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sa'i khams gzung ba'i phyir
504a4('bum): bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ chu'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ me'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/

504a6('bum): ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ ma rig pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i
504a7('bum): phyir ma yin/ 'du byed gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ ming
504b1('bum): dang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ skye mched drug gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ reg pa gzung ba'i phyir
504b2('bum): bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sred pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung
504b3('bum): ba'i phyir ma yin/ len pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ srid pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ skye ba gzung
504b4('bum): ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rga shi gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma
504b5('bum): yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i
504b6('bum): phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha
504b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa
505a1('bum): ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung
505a2('bum): ba'i phyir ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong ba nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung
505a3('bum): ba'i phyir ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung

505a5('bum): ba'i phyir ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma
505a6('bum): yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan

505b1('bum): gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ dngos po med pa

505b3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung
505b4('bum): ba'i phyir ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/

505b6('bum): phyir ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa
505b7('bum): ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan
506a1('bum): pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i
506a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i
506a3('bum): phyir ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
506a4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/

506a6('bum): yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams gzung

506b1('bum): gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ snying rje chen po gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams

506b6('bum): ma yin/ lha'i bu dag /gang yang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / 'du
506b7('bum): shes gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / 'du byed gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/

507a7('bum): pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / yid
507b1('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg

507b7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / sa'i khams gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / chu'i khams
508a1('bum): gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / me'i khams gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rlung gi khams

508a3('bum): phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / ma rig pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / 'du byed gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /

508a5('bum): ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / reg pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa
508a6('bum): dang / sred pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / len pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / srid pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi
508a7('bum): gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / skye ba gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rga shi gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
508b1('bum): phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
508b2('bum): tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
